trans-unit.source: An Enumeration can be converted into an Iterator by using the Enumeration.asIterator() method.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Enumeration 可以被转换成一个 Iterator 通过使用 Enumeration.asIterator() 方法。

trans-unit.source: An Exchanger allows two threads to exchange objects at a rendezvous point, and is useful in several pipeline designs.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Exchanger 允许两个线程交换对象的集合点，并在多流水线设计中是有用的。

trans-unit.source: An Executor that provides methods to manage termination and methods that can produce a Future for tracking progress of one or more asynchronous tasks.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Executor ，提供用于管理终止的方法以及可以产生用于跟踪一个或多个异步任务进度的 Future 的方法。

trans-unit.source: An ExecutorService for running ForkJoinTasks.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ExecutorService 的运行 ForkJoinTask 秒。

trans-unit.source: An ExecutorService for running ForkJoinTasks. A ForkJoinPool provides the entry point for submissions from non-ForkJoinTask clients, as well as management and monitoring operations.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ExecutorService 的运行 ForkJoinTask 秒。一个 ForkJoinPool 提供了从非意见书切入点 ForkJoinTask 客户，以及管理和监控操作。

trans-unit.source: An ExecutorService that can schedule commands to run after a given delay, or to execute periodically.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ExecutorService ，可以安排命令在给定的延迟后运行或定期执行。

trans-unit.source: An ExecutorService that executes each submitted task using one of possibly several pooled threads, normally configured using Executors factory methods.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ExecutorService ，它使用可能是几个池线程中的一个执行每个提交的任务，通常使用 Executors 工厂方法进行配置。

trans-unit.source: An RMIServer object that is exported through JRMP and that creates client connections as RMI objects exported through JRMP.
trans-unit.target: 通过JRMP导出的 RMIServer 对象，该对象创建客户端连接，作为通过JRMP导出的RMI对象。

trans-unit.source: An RMIServer object that is exported through JRMP and that creates client connections as RMI objects exported through JRMP. User code does not usually reference this class directly.
trans-unit.target: 通过JRMP导出的 RMIServer 对象，该对象创建客户端连接，作为通过JRMP导出的RMI对象。用户代码通常不直接引用此类。

trans-unit.source: An RMIServerImpl that is exported through IIOP and that creates client connections as RMI objects exported through IIOP.
trans-unit.target: 通过IIOP导出的 RMIServerImpl ，它创建客户端连接，作为通过IIOP导出的RMI对象。

trans-unit.source: An RMIServerImpl that is exported through IIOP and that creates client connections as RMI objects exported through IIOP. User code does not usually reference this class directly.
trans-unit.target: 通过IIOP导出的 RMIServerImpl ，它创建客户端连接，作为通过IIOP导出的RMI对象。用户代码通常不直接引用此类。

trans-unit.source: An unmodifiable view
trans-unit.target: 一个不可修改视图

trans-unit.source: An APPLICATION_MODAL dialog blocks all top-level windows from the same Java application except those from its own child hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 一个 APPLICATION_MODAL 对话框阻止所有顶层窗口的除了那些从自己的子层次结构相同的Java应用程序。

trans-unit.source: An APPLICATION_MODAL dialog blocks all top-level windows from the same Java application except those from its own child hierarchy. If there are several applets launched in a browser, they can be treated either as separate applications or a single one. This behavior is implementation-dependent.
trans-unit.target: 一个 APPLICATION_MODAL 对话框阻止所有顶层窗口的除了那些从自己的子层次结构相同的Java应用程序。如果浏览器中启动了多个小程序，则可以将它们视为单独的应用程序，也可以将其视为一个应用程序。此行为是与实现有关的。

trans-unit.source: An AWTEvent that adds support for JInternalFrame objects as the event source.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AWTEvent ，它添加对 JInternalFrame 对象的支持作为事件源。

trans-unit.source: An AWTEvent that adds support for JInternalFrame objects as the event source. This class has the same event types as WindowEvent, although different IDs are used. Help on handling internal frame events is in How to Write an Internal Frame Listener, a section in The Java Tutorial.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AWTEvent ，它添加对 JInternalFrame 对象的支持作为事件源。此类具有与 WindowEvent 相同的事件类型，尽管使用了不同的ID。有关如何处理内部框架事件的帮助，请参见《 Java教程》的“如何编写内部框架侦听器”部分。

trans-unit.source: An AWTEvent that adds support for JInternalFrame objects as the event source. This class has the same event types as WindowEvent, although different IDs are used. Help on handling internal frame events is in How to Write an Internal Frame Listener, a section in The Java Tutorial.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AWTEvent ，它添加对 JInternalFrame 对象的支持作为事件源。此类具有与 WindowEvent 相同的事件类型，尽管使用了不同的ID。有关如何处理内部框架事件的帮助，请参见《 Java教程》的“如何编写内部框架侦听器”部分。

trans-unit.source: An AWTKeyStroke represents a key action on the keyboard, or equivalent input device.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AWTKeyStroke 表示键盘或等效输入装置上的键操作。

trans-unit.source: An AWTKeyStroke represents a key action on the keyboard, or equivalent input device. AWTKeyStrokes can correspond to only a press or release of a particular key, just as KEY_PRESSED and KEY_RELEASED KeyEvents do; alternately, they can correspond to typing a specific Java character, just as KEY_TYPED KeyEvents do. In all cases, AWTKeyStrokes can specify modifiers (alt, shift, control, meta, altGraph, or a combination thereof) which must be present during the action for an exact match.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AWTKeyStroke 表示键盘或等效输入装置上的键操作。就像 KEY_PRESSED 和 KEY_RELEASED KeyEvent 一样， AWTKeyStroke 只能对应于特定键的按下或释放。或者，它们可以对应于键入特定的Java字符，就像 KEY_TYPED KeyEvent 一样。在所有情况下， AWTKeyStroke 都可以指定修饰符（alt，shift，control，meta，altGraph或它们的组合），这些修饰符在操作期间必须存在以进行精确匹配。

trans-unit.source: An AbstractFormatter can only be active in one JFormattedTextField at a time. JFormattedTextField invokes install when it is ready to use it followed by uninstall when done. Subclasses that wish to install additional state should override install and message super appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 一次只能在一个 JFormattedTextField 中激活 AbstractFormatter 。准备好使用 JFormattedTextField 时，将调用 install ，完成后将 uninstall 。希望安装其他状态的子类应适当覆盖 install 和message super。

trans-unit.source: An AccessException is thrown by certain methods of the java.rmi.Naming class (specifically bind, rebind, and unbind) and methods of the java.rmi.activation.ActivationSystem interface to indicate that the caller does not have permission to perform the action requested by the method call.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AccessException 由的某些方法抛出 java.rmi.Naming 中类（具体地 bind ， rebind ，和 unbind ）和方法 java.rmi.activation.ActivationSystem 中接口，以指示主叫方不必执行所请求的操作通过方法调用。

trans-unit.source: An AccessException is thrown by certain methods of the java.rmi.Naming class (specifically bind, rebind, and unbind) and methods of the java.rmi.activation.ActivationSystem interface to indicate that the caller does not have permission to perform the action requested by the method call. If the method was invoked from a non-local host, then an AccessException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AccessException 由的某些方法抛出 java.rmi.Naming 中类（具体地 bind ， rebind ，和 unbind ）和方法 java.rmi.activation.ActivationSystem 中接口，以指示主叫方不必执行所请求的操作通过方法调用。如果该方法是从非本地主机调用的，则抛出 AccessException 。

trans-unit.source: An ActionListener object is registered via addActionListener.
trans-unit.target: 通过 addActionListener 注册一个 ActionListener 对象。

trans-unit.source: An ActivationGroup is
trans-unit.target: 一个 ActivationGroup 是

trans-unit.source: An ActivationGroup is responsible for creating new instances of "activatable" objects in its group, informing its ActivationMonitor when either: its object's become active or inactive, or the group as a whole becomes inactive.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ActivationGroup 负责创建在其基团“可活化的”对象的新实例，通知其 ActivationMonitor 当任：它的对象变成活动的或者不活动的，或基团作为整体变得不活动。

trans-unit.source: An ActivationInstantiator is responsible for creating instances of "activatable" objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ActivationInstantiator 时负责创建“可激活”对象的实例。

trans-unit.source: An ActivationInstantiator is responsible for creating instances of "activatable" objects. A concrete subclass of ActivationGroup implements the newInstance method to handle creating objects within the group.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ActivationInstantiator 时负责创建“可激活”对象的实例。 ActivationGroup 的具体子类实现 newInstance 方法来处理在组内创建对象。

trans-unit.source: An ActivationMonitor is specific to an ActivationGroup and is obtained when a group is reported active via a call to ActivationSystem.activeGroup (this is done internally).
trans-unit.target: 一个 ActivationMonitor 特定于一个 ActivationGroup 并且当经由到呼叫被报告为活动的一组中获得 ActivationSystem.activeGroup （这是内部完成）。

trans-unit.source: An ActivationMonitor is specific to an ActivationGroup and is obtained when a group is reported active via a call to ActivationSystem.activeGroup (this is done internally). An activation group is responsible for informing its ActivationMonitor when either: its objects become active or inactive, or the group as a whole becomes inactive.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ActivationMonitor 特定于一个 ActivationGroup 并且当经由到呼叫被报告为活动的一组中获得 ActivationSystem.activeGroup （这是内部完成）。激活组负责在以下情况下通知其 ActivationMonitor ：其对象变为活动状态或非活动状态，或者组整体上变为非活动状态。

trans-unit.source: An AdjustmentListener object is registered via addAdjustmentListener.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AdjustmentListener 对象通过注册 addAdjustmentListener 。

trans-unit.source: An AlgorithmParameters object for managing the parameters for a particular algorithm can be obtained by calling one of the getInstance factory methods (static methods that return instances of a given class).
trans-unit.target: 可以通过调用 getInstance 工厂方法（返回给定类实例的静态方法）之一来获取用于管理特定算法参数的 AlgorithmParameters 对象。

trans-unit.source: An AlreadyBoundException is thrown if an attempt is made to bind an object in the registry to a name that already has an associated binding.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AlreadyBoundException 如果试图将注册表中的对象绑定到已具有相关绑定的名字被抛出。

trans-unit.source: An AlreadyBoundException is thrown if an attempt is made to bind an object to a name that already has an associated binding in the registry.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AlreadyBoundException 如果试图将对象绑定到已具有相关注册表绑定的名称被抛出。

trans-unit.source: An Area may take more path segments to describe the same geometry even when the original outline is simple and obvious. The analysis that the Area class must perform on the path may not reflect the same concepts of "simple and obvious" as a human being perceives.
trans-unit.target: 即使原始轮廓简单明了，一个 Area 也可能需要更多路径段来描述相同的几何图形。 Area 类必须在路径上执行的分析可能无法反映出人类所感知的“简单而明显”的概念。

trans-unit.source: An Area object stores and manipulates a resolution-independent description of an enclosed area of 2-dimensional space.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Area 的对象存储和操作的2维空间中的封闭区域的与分辨率无关的描述。

trans-unit.source: An Area object stores and manipulates a resolution-independent description of an enclosed area of 2-dimensional space. Area objects can be transformed and can perform various Constructive Area Geometry (CAG) operations when combined with other Area objects. The CAG operations include area addition, subtraction, intersection, and exclusive or. See the linked method documentation for examples of the various operations.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Area 的对象存储和操作的2维空间中的封闭区域的与分辨率无关的描述。与其他 Area 对象结合使用时，可以对 Area 对象进行变形并执行各种构造性区域几何（CAG）操作。CAG操作包括区域 addition ， subtraction ， intersection 和 exclusive or 。有关各种操作的示例，请参见链接的方法文档。

trans-unit.source: An ArithmeticException exception is thrown if
trans-unit.target: 如果发生以下情况，则会引发 ArithmeticException 异常

trans-unit.source: An ArrayOutOfBoundsException may be thrown if the coordinates are not in bounds. However, explicit bounds checking is not guaranteed.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ArrayOutOfBoundsException 如果坐标不在边界可能抛出。但是，不能保证明确的边界检查。

trans-unit.source: An ArrayOutOfBoundsException may be thrown if the region is not in bounds. However, explicit bounds checking is not guaranteed.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ArrayOutOfBoundsException 如果该区域不在边界可能抛出。但是，不能保证明确的边界检查。

trans-unit.source: An ArrayType is assignable from another ArrayType if they have the same dimension; and both are primitive arrays or neither is; and the element type of the first is assignable from the element type of the second.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ArrayType 具有相同的维，则可以从另一个 ArrayType 分配它；两者都是原始数组，或者都不是；和元素类型的第一个是从所述第二的元素类型分配。

trans-unit.source: An ArrayType is assignable from another ArrayType if they have the same dimension; and both are primitive arrays or neither is; and the element type of the first is assignable from the element type of the second.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ArrayType 具有相同的维，则可以从另一个 ArrayType 分配它；两者都是原始数组，或者都不是；和元素类型的第一个是从所述第二的元素类型分配。

trans-unit.source: An Association is returned from an SctpChannel or an SctpMultiChannel, as well as being given as a parameter to NotificationHandler methods.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Association 是从返回 SctpChannel 或 SctpMultiChannel ，以及被赋予作为参数 NotificationHandler 方法。

trans-unit.source: An AsynchronousFileChannel is associated with a thread pool to which tasks are submitted to handle I/O events and dispatch to completion handlers that consume the results of I/O operations on the channel. The completion handler for an I/O operation initiated on a channel is guaranteed to be invoked by one of the threads in the thread pool (This ensures that the completion handler is run by a thread with the expected identity). Where an I/O operation completes immediately, and the initiating thread is itself a thread in the thread pool, then the completion handler may be invoked directly by the initiating thread. When an AsynchronousFileChannel is created without specifying a thread pool then the channel is associated with a system-dependent default thread pool that may be shared with other channels. The default thread pool is configured by the system properties defined by the AsynchronousChannelGroup class.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AsynchronousFileChannel 与一个线程池相关联，任务被提交到该线程池以处理I / O事件，并分派给使用该通道上I / O操作结果的完成处理程序。确保在通道上启动的I / O操作的完成处理程序由线程池中的线程之一调用（这确保完成处理程序由具有预期标识的线程运行）。如果I / O操作立即完成，并且发起线程本身就是线程池中的线程，那么可以由发起线程直接调用完成处理程序。当一个 AsynchronousFileChannel 如果在未指定线程池的情况下创建了线程，则该通道与可能与其他通道共享的系统相关的默认线程池相关联。默认线程池由 AsynchronousChannelGroup 类定义的系统属性配置。

trans-unit.source: An AtomicMarkableReference maintains an object reference along with a mark bit, that can be updated atomically.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AtomicMarkableReference 维护带有标记位的对象引用，可以以原子被更新。

trans-unit.source: An AtomicStampedReference maintains an object reference along with an integer "stamp", that can be updated atomically.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AtomicStampedReference 与整数“邮票”，即可以原子被更新沿着保持一个对象引用。

trans-unit.source: An AttachPermission object contains a name (also referred to as a "target name") but no actions list; you either have the named permission or you don't. The following table provides a summary description of what the permission allows, and discusses the risks of granting code the permission.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AttachPermission 对象包含一个名称（也被称为“目标名称”），但没有动作列表;您要么具有命名权限，要么没有。下表提供了权限允许的摘要描述，并讨论了授予代码权限的风险。

trans-unit.source: An AttributeValueExp may be used anywhere a ValueExp is required.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AttributeValueExp 可以在任何地方使用一个 ValueExp 是必需的。

trans-unit.source: An AttributeValueExp with a null attribute.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AttributeValueExp 用null属性。

trans-unit.source: An AttributedCharacterIterator allows iteration through both text and related attribute information.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AttributedCharacterIterator 允许通过迭代对文本和相关属性信息。

trans-unit.source: An Attributes, SearchControls, or array object passed as a parameter to any method will not be modified by the service provider. The service provider may keep a reference to it for the duration of the operation, including any enumeration of the method's results and the processing of any referrals generated. The caller should not modify the object during this time. An Attributes object returned by any method is owned by the caller. The caller may subsequently modify it; the service provider will not.
trans-unit.target: 服务提供者将不会修改作为参数传递给任何方法的 Attributes ， SearchControls 或数组对象。服务提供商可以在操作期间保留对它的引用，包括方法结果的任何枚举和所生成的任何引用的处理。在此期间，调用方不应修改该对象。调用者拥有任何方法返回的 Attributes 对象。调用者可以随后对其进行修改；服务提供商不会。

trans-unit.source: An AudioFileFormat object can include a set of properties. A property is a pair of key and value: the key is of type String, the associated property value is an arbitrary object. Properties specify additional informational meta data (like a author, copyright, or file duration). Properties are optional information, and file reader and file writer implementations are not required to provide or recognize properties.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AudioFileFormat 对象可以包括一组属性。属性是键和值对：键的类型为 String ，关联的属性值是任意对象。属性指定其他信息性元数据（例如作者，版权或文件持续时间）。属性是可选信息，并且不需要文件读取器和文件编写器实现来提供或识别属性。

trans-unit.source: An AudioFormat object can include a set of properties. A property is a pair of key and value: the key is of type String, the associated property value is an arbitrary object. Properties specify additional format specifications, like the bit rate for compressed formats. Properties are mainly used as a means to transport additional information of the audio format to and from the service providers. Therefore, properties are ignored in the matches(AudioFormat) method. However, methods which rely on the installed service providers, like (AudioFormat, AudioFormat) isConversionSupported may consider properties, depending on the respective service provider implementation.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AudioFormat 对象可以包括一组属性。属性是一对键和值：键的类型为 String ，关联的属性值为任意对象。属性指定其他格式规范，例如压缩格式的比特率。属性主要用作将音频格式的附加信息往返于服务提供商的手段。因此，在 matches(AudioFormat) 方法中将忽略属性。但是，依赖于已安装的服务提供者的方法（例如 (AudioFormat, AudioFormat) isConversionSupported 可能会考虑属性，具体取决于相应的服务提供者实现。

trans-unit.source: An AudioFormat object can include a set of properties. A property is a pair of key and value: the key is of type String, the associated property value is an arbitrary object. Properties specify additional format specifications, like the bit rate for compressed formats. Properties are mainly used as a means to transport additional information of the audio format to and from the service providers. Therefore, properties are ignored in the matches(AudioFormat) method. However, methods which rely on the installed service providers, like (AudioFormat, AudioFormat) isConversionSupported may consider properties, depending on the respective service provider implementation.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AudioFormat 对象可以包括一组属性。属性是键和值对：键的类型为 String ，关联的属性值是任意对象。属性指定其他格式规范，例如压缩格式的比特率。属性主要用作将音频格式的附加信息往返于服务提供商的手段。因此，在 matches(AudioFormat) 方法中将忽略属性。但是，依赖于已安装的服务提供商的方法，例如 (AudioFormat, AudioFormat) isConversionSupported 可能会考虑属性，具体取决于各自的服务提供商实现。

trans-unit.source: An Encoder is a class which can be used to create files or streams that encode the state of a collection of JavaBeans in terms of their public APIs.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Encoder 是一种可用于创建文件或流其编码JavaBeans集合的状态，他们的公共API对一类。

trans-unit.source: An Encoder is a class which can be used to create files or streams that encode the state of a collection of JavaBeans in terms of their public APIs. The Encoder, in conjunction with its persistence delegates, is responsible for breaking the object graph down into a series of Statements and Expressions which can be used to create it. A subclass typically provides a syntax for these expressions using some human readable form - like Java source code or XML.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Encoder 是一种可用于创建文件或流其编码JavaBeans集合的状态，他们的公共API对一类。的 Encoder ，在具有其持久委托一起，负责打破对象图分解成一系列 Statement S和 Expression 可被用于创建它秒。子类通常使用某种人类可读的形式（例如Java源代码或XML）为这些表达式提供语法。

trans-unit.source: An Encoder is a class which can be used to create files or streams that encode the state of a collection of JavaBeans in terms of their public APIs. The Encoder, in conjunction with its persistence delegates, is responsible for breaking the object graph down into a series of Statementss and Expressions which can be used to create it. A subclass typically provides a syntax for these expressions using some human readable form - like Java source code or XML.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Encoder 是一种可用于创建文件或流其编码JavaBeans集合的状态，他们的公共API对一类。的 Encoder ，在具有其持久委托一起，负责打破对象图分解成一系列 Statements S和 Expression S的可用于创建它。子类通常使用某种人类可读的形式（例如Java源代码或XML）为这些表达式提供语法。

trans-unit.source: An Entity node does not have any parent.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Entity 节点没有任何父。

trans-unit.source: An Entry object is passed to instances of RowFilter, allowing the filter to get the value of the entry's data, and thus to determine whether the entry should be shown.
trans-unit.target: 将 Entry 对象传递到 RowFilter 的实例，允许过滤器获取条目数据的值，从而确定是否应显示该条目。

trans-unit.source: An Entry object is passed to instances of RowFilter, allowing the filter to get the value of the entry's data, and thus to determine whether the entry should be shown. An Entry object contains information about the model as well as methods for getting the underlying values from the model.
trans-unit.target: 将 Entry 对象传递到 RowFilter 的实例，允许过滤器获取条目数据的值，从而确定是否应显示该条目。一个 Entry 对象包含有关模型以及从模型中获取底层值的方法的信息。

trans-unit.source: An EnumControl provides control over a set of discrete possible values, each represented by an object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EnumControl 提供对一组离散的可能的值，每一个都由一个对象表示的控制。

trans-unit.source: An EnumControl provides control over a set of discrete possible values, each represented by an object. In a graphical user interface, such a control might be represented by a set of buttons, each of which chooses one value or setting. For example, a reverb control might provide several preset reverberation settings, instead of providing continuously adjustable parameters of the sort that would be represented by FloatControl objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个 EnumControl 提供对一组离散的可能的值，每一个都由一个对象表示的控制。在图形用户界面中，此类控件可能由一组按钮表示，每个按钮都选择一个值或设置。例如，一个混响控件可能会提供几个预设的混响设置，而不是提供可以由 FloatControl 对象表示的那种连续可调的参数。

trans-unit.source: An Enumeration of URLs. If the loader is closed, the Enumeration contains no elements.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Enumeration 的 URL 秒。如果关闭加载程序，则枚举不包含任何元素。

trans-unit.source: An Error is a subclass of Throwable that indicates serious problems that a reasonable application should not try to catch.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Error 是的子类 Throwable ，表示严重的问题，合理的应用程序不应该试图捕获。

trans-unit.source: An Error is a subclass of Throwable that indicates serious problems that a reasonable application should not try to catch. Most such errors are abnormal conditions. The ThreadDeath error, though a "normal" condition, is also a subclass of Error because most applications should not try to catch it.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Error 是的子类 Throwable ，表示严重的问题，合理的应用程序不应该试图捕获。大多数此类错误是异常情况。该 ThreadDeath 错误，虽然是“正常”的情况下，也是一个子类 Error ，因为大多数应用程序不应该试图抓住它。

trans-unit.source: An Event object generated when an event occurs to a RowSet object.
trans-unit.target: RowSet 对象发生事件时生成的 Event 对象。

trans-unit.source: An Event object generated when an event occurs to a RowSet object. A RowSetEvent object is generated when a single row in a rowset is changed, the whole rowset is changed, or the rowset cursor moves.
trans-unit.target: RowSet 对象发生事件时生成的 Event 对象。甲 RowSetEvent 当行集中的单个行改变时生成的对象，整个行集发生变化，或者行集光标移动。

trans-unit.source: An Event object that provides information about the source of a connection-related event.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Event 对象，该对象提供有关与连接有关的事件的来源的信息。

trans-unit.source: An Event object that provides information about the source of a connection-related event. ConnectionEvent objects are generated when an application closes a pooled connection and when an error occurs. The ConnectionEvent object contains two kinds of information:
trans-unit.target: 一个 Event 对象，该对象提供有关与连接有关的事件的来源的信息。当应用程序关闭池化连接并发生错误时，将生成 ConnectionEvent 对象。在 ConnectionEvent 对象包含两种信息：

trans-unit.source: An EventSettings object for a recording can be obtained by invoking the Recording.enable(String) method which is configured using method chaining.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过调用使用方法链接配置的 Recording.enable(String) 方法来获取用于记录的 EventSettings 对象。

trans-unit.source: An ExecutorService can be shut down, which will cause it to reject new tasks. Two different methods are provided for shutting down an ExecutorService. The shutdown() method will allow previously submitted tasks to execute before terminating, while the shutdownNow() method prevents waiting tasks from starting and attempts to stop currently executing tasks. Upon termination, an executor has no tasks actively executing, no tasks awaiting execution, and no new tasks can be submitted. An unused ExecutorService should be shut down to allow reclamation of its resources.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ExecutorService 中可以关闭，这将导致其拒绝新任务。提供了两种不同的方法来关闭 ExecutorService 。的 shutdown() 方法将允许以前提交的任务，以终止之前执行，而 shutdownNow() 方法阻止启动并试图停止当前正在执行的任务正在等待的任务。终止后，执行者将没有正在执行的任务，没有正在等待执行的任务，并且无法提交新任务。应该关闭未使用的 ExecutorService 以便回收其资源。

trans-unit.source: An ExecutorService can be shut down, which will cause it to reject new tasks. Two different methods are provided for shutting down an ExecutorService. The shutdown() method will allow previously submitted tasks to execute before terminating, while the shutdownNow() method prevents waiting tasks from starting and attempts to stop currently executing tasks. Upon termination, an executor has no tasks actively executing, no tasks awaiting execution, and no new tasks can be submitted. An unused ExecutorService should be shut down to allow reclamation of its resources.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ExecutorService 中可以关闭，这将导致其拒绝新任务。提供了两种不同的方法来关闭 ExecutorService 。的 shutdown() 方法将允许以前提交的任务，以终止之前执行，而 shutdownNow() 方法阻止启动并试图停止当前正在执行的任务正在等待的任务。终止后，执行者将没有正在执行的任务，没有正在等待执行的任务，并且无法提交新任务。应该关闭未使用的 ExecutorService 以便回收其资源。

trans-unit.source: An ExportException is a RemoteException thrown if an attempt to export a remote object fails.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ExportException 是 RemoteException 如果导出远程对象的尝试失败抛出。

trans-unit.source: An ExportException is a RemoteException thrown if an attempt to export a remote object fails. A remote object is exported via the constructors and exportObject methods of java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject and java.rmi.activation.Activatable.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ExportException 是 RemoteException 如果导出远程对象的尝试失败抛出。远程对象通过 java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject 和 java.rmi.activation.Activatable 的构造函数和 exportObject 方法导出。

trans-unit.source: An Expression object represents a primitive expression in which a single method is applied to a target and a set of arguments to return a result - as in "a.getFoo()".
trans-unit.target: 一个 Expression 对象表示，其中一个单一的方法应用于一个目标和一组参数，以返回的结果的原始表达式-如在 "a.getFoo()" 。

trans-unit.source: An HTMLCollection is a list of nodes.
trans-unit.target: 一个 HTMLCollection 是节点的列表。

trans-unit.source: An HTMLCollection is a list of nodes. An individual node may be accessed by either ordinal index or the node'sname or id attributes. Note: Collections in the HTML DOM are assumed to be live meaning that they are automatically updated when the underlying document is changed.
trans-unit.target: 一个 HTMLCollection 是节点的列表。单个节点可以通过序号索引或节点的 name 或 id 属性进行访问。注意：HTML DOM中的集合被认为是实时的，这意味着当基础文档发生更改时，它们会自动更新。

trans-unit.source: An HTMLDocument is the root of the HTML hierarchy and holds the entire content.
trans-unit.target: 一个 HTMLDocument 的是HTML层次的根和持有的全部内容。

trans-unit.source: An HTMLDocument is the root of the HTML hierarchy and holds the entire content. Besides providing access to the hierarchy, it also provides some convenience methods for accessing certain sets of information from the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 HTMLDocument 的是HTML层次的根和持有的全部内容。除了提供对层次结构的访问之外，它还提供了一些方便的方法来访问文档中的某些信息集。

trans-unit.source: An HierarchyBoundsListener object is registered via addHierarchyBoundsListener.
trans-unit.target: 一个 HierarchyBoundsListener 对象通过注册 addHierarchyBoundsListener 。

trans-unit.source: An HierarchyListener object is registered via addHierarchyListener.
trans-unit.target: 一个 HierarchyListener 对象通过注册 addHierarchyListener 。

trans-unit.source: An HttpClient can be used to send requests and retrieve their responses. An HttpClient is created through a builder. The builder can be used to configure per-client state, like: the preferred protocol version ( HTTP/1.1 or HTTP/2 ), whether to follow redirects, a proxy, an authenticator, etc. Once built, an HttpClient is immutable, and can be used to send multiple requests.
trans-unit.target: 一个 HttpClient 的可以用来发送请求和检索他们的回应。一个 HttpClient 的是通过创建 builder 。该构建器可用于配置每个客户端的状态，例如：首选协议版本（HTTP / 1.1或HTTP / 2），是否遵循重定向，代理，身份验证器等。构建后， HttpClient 是不可变的，并且可用于发送多个请求。

trans-unit.source: An HttpClient provides configuration information, and resource sharing, for all requests sent through it.
trans-unit.target: 一个 HttpClient 的提供配置信息，资源共享，通过它发送的所有请求。

trans-unit.source: An HttpHeaders is not typically created directly, but rather returned from an HttpRequest or an HttpResponse. Specific HTTP headers can be set for a request through one of the request builder's headers methods.
trans-unit.target: 一个 HttpHeaders 通常不直接创建，而是从而返回 HttpRequest 或 HttpResponse 对象。特定HTTP标头可以为一个被设置请求通过请求构建器的一个 headers 的方法。

trans-unit.source: An HttpRequest instance is built through an HttpRequestbuilder. An HttpRequest builder is obtained from one of the newBuilder methods. A request's URI, headers, and body can be set. Request bodies are provided through a BodyPublisher supplied to one of the POST, PUT or method methods. Once all required parameters have been set in the builder, build will return the HttpRequest. Builders can be copied and modified many times in order to build multiple related requests that differ in some parameters.
trans-unit.target: 一个 HttpRequest 的实例，通过内置 HttpRequest 建设者。一个 HttpRequest 的助洗剂是从所述一个获得的 newBuilder 方法。可以设置请求的 URI ，标头和正文。通过提供给 POST ， PUT 或 method 方法之一的 BodyPublisher 提供请求正文。在构建器中设置了所有必需的参数后， build 将返回 HttpRequest 。可以多次复制和修改构建器，以构建多个在某些参数上不同的相关请求。

trans-unit.source: An HttpResponse is not created directly, but rather returned as a result of sending an HttpRequest. An HttpResponse is made available when the response status code and headers have been received, and typically after the response body has also been completely received. Whether or not the HttpResponse is made available before the response body has been completely received depends on the BodyHandler provided when sending the HttpRequest.
trans-unit.target: 一个 HttpResponse 对象不是直接创建的，而是返回发送的结果 HttpRequest 。一个 HttpResponse 对象是可用时响应状态代码和头已收到，并通常后的反应身体也被完全接收。在完全接收响应主体之前是否使 HttpResponse 可用取决于发送 HttpRequest 时提供的 BodyHandler 。

trans-unit.source: An ICC_ColorSpace object can be constructed from an appropriate ICC_Profile. Typically, an ICC_ColorSpace would be associated with an ICC Profile which is either an input, display, or output profile (see the ICC specification). There are also device link, abstract, color space conversion, and named color profiles. These are less useful for tagging a color or image, but are useful for other purposes (in particular device link profiles can provide improved performance for converting from one device's color space to another's).
trans-unit.target: 一个 ICC_ColorSpace 对象可以从适当的构造 ICC_Profile 。通常， ICC_ColorSpace 将与ICC配置文件关联，该ICC配置文件可以是输入，显示或输出配置文件（请参阅ICC规范）。还有设备链接，抽象，颜色空间转换和命名的颜色配置文件。这些对于标记颜色或图像不太有用，但对其他目的有用（特别是设备链接配置文件可以提供从一个设备的色彩空间转换为另一个设备的色彩空间的改进性能）。

trans-unit.source: An IIOInvalidTreeException is thrown when an attempt by an IIOMetadata object to parse a tree of IIOMetadataNodes fails.
trans-unit.target: 一种 IIOInvalidTreeException 当被试图抛出 IIOMetadata 对象的解析树 IIOMetadataNode 小号失败。

trans-unit.source: An IIOInvalidTreeException is thrown when an attempt by an IIOMetadata object to parse a tree of IIOMetadataNodes fails. The node that led to the parsing error may be stored. As with any parsing error, the actual error may occur at a different point that that where it is detected. The node returned by getOffendingNode should merely be considered as a clue to the actual nature of the problem.
trans-unit.target: 一种 IIOInvalidTreeException 当被试图抛出 IIOMetadata 对象的解析树 IIOMetadataNode 小号失败。可以存储导致解析错误的节点。与任何解析错误一样，实际错误可能发生在与检测到错误的位置不同的位置。由 getOffendingNode 返回的节点仅应视为问题实际性质的线索。

trans-unit.source: An IIOMetadata object containing metadata associated with the image.
trans-unit.target: 一个 IIOMetadata 对象，其中包含与图像关联的元数据。

trans-unit.source: An IIOMetadataController that is suggested for use as the controller for this IIOMetadata object.
trans-unit.target: 建议将 IIOMetadataController 用作此 IIOMetadata 对象的控制器。

trans-unit.source: An IIOMetadataController that is suggested for use as the controller for this IIOMetadata object. It may be retrieved via getDefaultController. To install the default controller, call setController(getDefaultController()). This instance variable should be set by subclasses that choose to provide their own default controller, usually a GUI, for setting parameters.
trans-unit.target: 建议将 IIOMetadataController 用作此 IIOMetadata 对象的控制器。可以通过 getDefaultController 检索它。要安装默认控制器，请调用 setController(getDefaultController()) 。该实例变量应由子类设置，这些子类选择提供自己的默认控制器（通常是GUI）来设置参数。

trans-unit.source: An IOException raised in WebSocket will result in an invocation of onError with that exception (if the input is not closed). Unless otherwise stated if the listener's method throws an exception or a CompletionStage returned from a method completes exceptionally, the WebSocket will invoke onError with this exception.
trans-unit.target: WebSocket 中引发的 IOException 将导致对该异常的 onError 调用（如果未关闭输入）。除非另有说明，否则如果侦听器的方法引发异常或从方法返回的 CompletionStage 异常完成，则WebSocket将使用此异常调用 onError 。

trans-unit.source: An IOException will be thrown if the previous marked position lies in the discarded portion of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 一个 IOException 异常会如果先前的标记位置位于流的丢弃部分被抛出。

trans-unit.source: An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if any of the argument keys are not recognized and are not namespace qualified.
trans-unit.target: 一个 IllegalArgumentException 如果任何参数键不能识别被抛出并没有命名空间限定。

trans-unit.source: An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if the precision section of the string is out of range (< 0) or the string is not in the format created by the toString() method.
trans-unit.target: 一个 IllegalArgumentException 如果字符串的精度部分超出范围（被抛出 < 0 ）或该字符串不是在由创建的格式 toString() 方法。

trans-unit.source: An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if the precision section of the string is out of range (< 0) or the string is not in the format created by the toString() method.
trans-unit.target: 一个 IllegalArgumentException 如果字符串的精度部分超出范围（被抛出 < 0 ）或该字符串不是在由创建的格式 toString() 方法。

trans-unit.source: An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if the source is the same as the destination.
trans-unit.target: 一个 IllegalArgumentException 如果源是一样的目的地被抛出。

trans-unit.source: An IllegalArgumentException may be thrown if the source and/or destination image is incompatible with the types of images $ allowed by the class implementing this filter.
trans-unit.target: 一个 IllegalArgumentException 如果源和/或目的地的图像是与实现此过滤器的类所允许的类型的图像的$不相容时可能抛出。

trans-unit.source: An IllegalStateException is thrown if nextSibling is not null and node is not a parent of nextSibling. An IllegalStateException is thrown if node is null and nextSibling is not null.
trans-unit.target: 一个 IllegalStateException 异常是否抛出 nextSibling 不是 null 和 node 不是父 nextSibling 。一个 IllegalStateException 异常是否被抛出 node 是 null 和 nextSibling 不 null 。

trans-unit.source: An ImageFilter subclass might override this method or not, depending on if and how it can send data in TDLR order. Three possibilities exist:
trans-unit.target: 一个 ImageFilter 的子类可能重写此方法与否，取决于是否以及如何在TDLR顺序发送数据。存在三种可能性：

trans-unit.source: An ImageReadParam object is used to specify how an image, or a set of images, will be converted on input from a stream in the context of the Java Image I/O framework. A plug-in for a specific image format will return instances of ImageReadParam from the getDefaultReadParam method of its ImageReader implementation.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ImageReadParam 对象用于指定如何图像或一组图像，将在输入在Java图像I / O架构的上下文中被转换从流。特定图像格式的插件将从其 ImageReader 实现的 getDefaultReadParam 方法返回 ImageReadParam 的实例。

trans-unit.source: An ImageTranscoder may be used to convert the IIOMetadata objects supplied by the ImageReader (representing per-stream and per-image metadata) into corresponding objects suitable for encoding by a particular ImageWriter. In the case where the methods of this interface are being called directly on an ImageWriter, the output will be suitable for that writer.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ImageTranscoder 可以用于转换 IIOMetadata 对象由所提供 ImageReader （表示每个流和每个图像元数据）转换成相应的适合于由特定编码对象 ImageWriter 。如果直接在 ImageWriter 上调用此接口的方法，则输出将适合该编写器。

trans-unit.source: An ImageTypeSpecifier to be used to generate a destination image when reading, or to set the output color type when writing.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ImageTypeSpecifier ，用于在读取时生成目标图像，或在写入时设置输出颜色类型。

trans-unit.source: An ImageTypeSpecifier to be used to generate a destination image when reading, or to set the output color type when writing. If non has been set the value will be null. By default, the value is null.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ImageTypeSpecifier ，用于在读取时生成目标图像，或在写入时设置输出颜色类型。如果设置为non，则该值为 null 。默认情况下，该值为 null 。

trans-unit.source: An ImageWriteParam may optionally be supplied for cases where it may affect thumbnail handling.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ImageWriteParam 可任选用于在那里它可以影响缩略图办案提供。

trans-unit.source: An ImageWriteParam may optionally be supplied to control the writing process. If param is null, a default write param will be used.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ImageWriteParam 可任选地提供给控制写入过程。如果 param 为 null ，则将使用默认的写参数。

trans-unit.source: An IndexOutOfBoundsException will be thrown if pos is smaller than the flushed position (as returned by getflushedPosition).
trans-unit.target: 一个 IndexOutOfBoundsException 异常如果将被抛出 pos 比冲洗位置（如通过返回较小 getflushedPosition ）。

trans-unit.source: An InetAddress representing the address of the network interface used for multicast packets, or if no interface has been set, an InetAddress representing any local address.
trans-unit.target: 一个 InetAddress 代表用于多播数据包的网络接口的地址；如果未设置接口，则一个 InetAddress 代表任何本地地址。

trans-unit.source: An InetAddress representing the address of the network interface used for multicast packets.
trans-unit.target: 一个 InetAddress ,它表示用于多播数据包的网络接口的地址。

trans-unit.source: An InitMaxStreams instance
trans-unit.target: 一个 InitMaxStreams 实例

trans-unit.source: An InputMethodListener object is registered via addInputMethodListener.
trans-unit.target: 一个 InputMethodListener 对象通过注册 addInputMethodListener 。

trans-unit.source: An Insets object is a representation of the borders of a container.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Insets 对象是容器的边界的表示形式。

trans-unit.source: An Insets object is a representation of the borders of a container. It specifies the space that a container must leave at each of its edges. The space can be a border, a blank space, or a title.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Insets 对象是容器的边界的表示形式。它指定了容器每个边缘必须保留的空间。该空格可以是边框，空白或标题。

trans-unit.source: An InvalidMidiDataException indicates that inappropriate MIDI data was encountered.
trans-unit.target: 一个 InvalidMidiDataException ，指示遇到了不恰当的MIDI数据。

trans-unit.source: An InvalidMidiDataException indicates that inappropriate MIDI data was encountered. This often means that the data is invalid in and of itself, from the perspective of the MIDI specification. An example would be an undefined status byte. However, the exception might simply mean that the data was invalid in the context it was used, or that the object to which the data was given was unable to parse or use it. For example, a file reader might not be able to parse a Type 2 MIDI file, even though that format is defined in the MIDI specification.
trans-unit.target: 一个 InvalidMidiDataException ，指示遇到了不恰当的MIDI数据。从MIDI规范的角度来看，这通常意味着数据本身是无效的。一个例子是未定义的状态字节。但是，该异常可能仅表示在使用数据的上下文中该数据无效，或者向其提供数据的对象无法解析或使用它。例如，即使在MIDI规范中定义了格式，文件阅读器也可能无法解析Type 2 MIDI文件。

trans-unit.source: An ItemListener object is registered via addItemListener.
trans-unit.target: 通过 addItemListener 注册一个 ItemListener 对象。

trans-unit.source: An Iterator that yields provider objects for the given service, in some arbitrary order. The iterator will throw an Error if a provider-configuration file violates the specified format or if a provider class cannot be found and instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Iterator ，它以某种任意顺序产生给定服务的提供程序对象。如果提供者配置文件违反指定的格式，或者找不到和实例化提供者类，则迭代器将引发 Error 。

trans-unit.source: An OBJECT_CHANGED event type is fired when (the contents of) an object has changed. This might mean that its attributes have been modified, added, or removed, and/or that the object itself has been replaced. How the object has changed can be determined by examining the NamingEvent's old and new bindings.
trans-unit.target: 一个 OBJECT_CHANGED 时（的内容）的对象已经改变事件类型被激发。这可能意味着其属性已被修改，添加或删除，和/或对象本身已被替换。可以通过检查 NamingEvent 的旧绑定和新绑定来确定对象的更改方式。

trans-unit.source: An ObjID created via this constructor will not clash with any ObjIDs generated via the no-arg constructor.
trans-unit.target: 通过此构造函数创建的 ObjID 不会与通过no-arg构造函数生成的任何 ObjID 冲突。

trans-unit.source: An ObjID instance contains an object number (of type long) and an address space identifier (of type UID). In a unique ObjID, the address space identifier is unique with respect to a given host over time. In a well-known ObjID, the address space identifier is equivalent to one returned by invoking the UID(short) constructor with the value zero.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ObjID 实例包含一个对象号（类型的 long ）和一个地址空间标识符（类型的 UID ）。在唯一的 ObjID 中，地址空间标识符相对于给定主机在时间上是唯一的。在众所周知的 ObjID 中，地址空间标识符等于通过调用值为零的 UID(short) 构造函数返回的标识符。

trans-unit.source: An ObjID is used to identify a remote object exported to an RMI runtime.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ObjID 用于标识导出到RMI运行时的远程对象。

trans-unit.source: An ObjID is used to identify a remote object exported to an RMI runtime. When a remote object is exported, it is assigned an object identifier either implicitly or explicitly, depending on the API used to export.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ObjID 用于标识导出到RMI运行时的远程对象。导出远程对象时，将根据用于导出的API为其隐式或显式分配一个对象标识符。

trans-unit.source: An Object array parsed from the string.
trans-unit.target: 从字符串解析的 Object 数组。

trans-unit.source: An Object array parsed from the string. In case of error, returns null.
trans-unit.target: 从字符串解析的 Object 数组。如果发生错误，则返回null。

trans-unit.source: An Object may be supplied to the plug-in at construction time. The nature of the object is entirely plug-in specific.
trans-unit.target: 可以在构造时将 Object 提供给插件。对象的性质完全是特定于插件的。

trans-unit.source: An Object parsed from the string.
trans-unit.target: 从字符串解析的 Object 。

trans-unit.source: An Object parsed from the string. In case of error, returns null.
trans-unit.target: 从字符串解析的 Object 。如果发生错误，则返回null。

trans-unit.source: An ObjectFactory is responsible for creating objects of a specific type. In the above example, you may have a PrinterObjectFactory for creating Printer objects.
trans-unit.target: 一 ObjectFactory 负责创建特定类型的对象。在上面的示例中，您可能具有用于创建 Printer 对象的 PrinterObjectFactory 。

trans-unit.source: An ObjectFactory is responsible for creating objects of a specific type. In the above example, you may have a PrinterObjectFactory for creating Printer objects.
trans-unit.target: 一 ObjectFactory 负责创建特定类型的对象。在上面的示例中，您可能具有用于创建打印机对象的PrinterObjectFactory。

trans-unit.source: An ObjectInstance, containing the ObjectName and the Java class name of the newly instantiated MBean. If the contained ObjectName is n, the contained Java class name is getMBeanInfo(n).getClassName().
trans-unit.target: 一个 ObjectInstance ，其中包含新实例化的MBean的 ObjectName 和Java类名称。如果所包含的 ObjectName 为 n ，则所包含的Java类名称为 getMBeanInfo(n).getClassName() 。

trans-unit.source: An ObjectInstance, containing the ObjectName and the Java class name of the newly instantiated MBean. If the contained ObjectName is n, the contained Java class name is getMBeanInfo(n).getClassName().
trans-unit.target: 一个 ObjectInstance ，其中包含新实例化的MBean的 ObjectName 和Java类名称。如果所包含的 ObjectName 为 n ，则所包含的Java类名称为 getMBeanInfo(n).getClassName() 。

trans-unit.source: An Operation contains a description of a Java method. Operation objects were used in JDK1.1 version stubs and skeletons. The Operation class is not needed for 1.2 style stubs (stubs generated with rmic -v1.2); hence, this class is deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Operation 包含Java方法的说明。在JDK1.1版本的存根和框架中使用了 Operation 对象。该 Operation 不需要用于1.2风格存根（与生成的存根类 rmic -v1.2 ）; 因此，不推荐使用此类。

trans-unit.source: An Operation contains a description of a Java method. Operation objects were used in JDK1.1 version stubs and skeletons. The Operation class is not needed for 1.2 style stubs; hence, this class is deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Operation 包含Java方法的说明。在JDK1.1版本的存根和框架中使用了 Operation 对象。该 Operation 并不需要1.2样式stub类; 因此，不推荐使用此类。

trans-unit.source: An RMIClientSocketFactory instance associated with a remote object will be downloaded to clients when the remote object's reference is transmitted in an RMI call. This RMIClientSocketFactory will be used to create connections to the remote object for remote method calls.
trans-unit.target: 当在RMI调用中传输远程对象的引用时，与远程对象关联的 RMIClientSocketFactory 实例将下载到客户端。此 RMIClientSocketFactory 将用于创建到远程对象的连接，以进行远程方法调用。

trans-unit.source: An RMIClientSocketFactory instance can also be associated with a remote object registry so that clients can use custom socket communication with a remote object registry.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RMIClientSocketFactory 实例也可以与远程对象注册表关联，所以客户端可以使用与远程对象注册表的自定义套接字通信。

trans-unit.source: An RMIClientSocketFactory instance is used by the RMI runtime in order to obtain client sockets for RMI calls.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RMIClientSocketFactory 的实例，以获得客户端套接字RMI调用中使用由RMI运行。

trans-unit.source: An RMIClientSocketFactory instance is used by the RMI runtime in order to obtain client sockets for RMI calls. A remote object can be associated with an RMIClientSocketFactory when it is created/exported via the constructors or exportObject methods of java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject and java.rmi.activation.Activatable .
trans-unit.target: 一个 RMIClientSocketFactory 的实例，以获得客户端套接字RMI调用中使用由RMI运行。通过 java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject 和 java.rmi.activation.Activatable 的构造函数或 exportObject 方法创建/导出远程对象时，可以将其与 RMIClientSocketFactory 关联。

trans-unit.source: An RMIFailureHandler can be registered via the RMISocketFactory.setFailureHandler call.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RMIFailureHandler 可以通过注册 RMISocketFactory.setFailureHandler 电话。

trans-unit.source: An RMIFailureHandler can be registered via the RMISocketFactory.setFailureHandler call. The failure method of the handler is invoked when the RMI runtime is unable to create a ServerSocket to listen for incoming calls. The failure method returns a boolean indicating whether the runtime should attempt to re-create the ServerSocket.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RMIFailureHandler 可以通过注册 RMISocketFactory.setFailureHandler 电话。当RMI运行时无法创建 ServerSocket 侦听传入的调用时，将调用处理程序的 failure 方法。该 failure 方法返回一个布尔值，指示运行时是否应尝试重新创建 ServerSocket 。

trans-unit.source: An RMISecurityException signals that a security exception has occurred during the execution of one of java.rmi.RMISecurityManager's methods.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RMISecurityException 信号是一个执行过程中发生了安全异常 java.rmi.RMISecurityManager 的方法。

trans-unit.source: An RMIServerSocketFactory instance associated with a remote object is used to obtain the ServerSocket used to accept incoming calls from clients.
trans-unit.target: 与远程对象关联的 RMIServerSocketFactory 实例用于获取用于接受来自客户端的传入调用的 ServerSocket 。

trans-unit.source: An RMIServerSocketFactory instance can also be associated with a remote object registry so that clients can use custom socket communication with a remote object registry.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RMIServerSocketFactory 实例也可以与远程对象注册表关联，所以客户端可以使用与远程对象注册表的自定义套接字通信。

trans-unit.source: An RMIServerSocketFactory instance is used by the RMI runtime in order to obtain server sockets for RMI calls.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RMIServerSocketFactory 实例，以便获得服务器套接字RMI调用中使用由RMI运行。

trans-unit.source: An RMIServerSocketFactory instance is used by the RMI runtime in order to obtain server sockets for RMI calls. A remote object can be associated with an RMIServerSocketFactory when it is created/exported via the constructors or exportObject methods of java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject and java.rmi.activation.Activatable .
trans-unit.target: 一个 RMIServerSocketFactory 实例，以便获得服务器套接字RMI调用中使用由RMI运行。通过 java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject 和 java.rmi.activation.Activatable 的构造函数或 exportObject 方法创建/导出远程对象时，可以将其与 RMIServerSocketFactory 关联。

trans-unit.source: An RMISocketFactory instance is used by the RMI runtime in order to obtain client and server sockets for RMI calls.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RMISocketFactory 实例，以获得客户端和服务器套接字RMI调用中使用由RMI运行。

trans-unit.source: An RMISocketFactory instance is used by the RMI runtime in order to obtain client and server sockets for RMI calls. An application may use the setSocketFactory method to request that the RMI runtime use its socket factory instance instead of the default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 一个 RMISocketFactory 实例，以获得客户端和服务器套接字RMI调用中使用由RMI运行。应用程序可以使用 setSocketFactory 方法来请求RMI运行时使用其套接字工厂实例而不是默认实现。

trans-unit.source: An SCTPServerChannel is created by invoking the open method of this class. A newly-created SCTP server channel is open but not yet bound. An attempt to invoke the accept method of an unbound channel will cause the NotYetBoundException to be thrown. An SCTP server channel can be bound by invoking one of the bind methods defined by this class.
trans-unit.target: 一个 SCTPServerChannel 通过调用创建 open 这个类的方法。新创建的SCTP服务器通道已打开，但尚未绑定。尝试调用未绑定通道的 accept 方法将导致引发 NotYetBoundException 。可以通过调用此类定义的 bind 方法之一来绑定SCTP服务器通道。

trans-unit.source: An SSLEngine is created by calling SSLContext.createSSLEngine() from an initialized SSLContext. Any configuration parameters should be set before making the first call to wrap(), unwrap(), or beginHandshake(). These methods all trigger the initial handshake.
trans-unit.target: 一个 SSLEngine 通过调用创建 SSLContext.createSSLEngine() 从一个初始化 SSLContext 。任何配置参数应使得在第一次调用之前设置 wrap() ， unwrap() 或 beginHandshake() 。这些方法都触发初始握手。

trans-unit.source: An SSLEngine is created by calling SSLContext.createSSLEngine() from an initialized SSLContext. Any configuration parameters should be set before making the first call to wrap(), unwrap(), or beginHandshake(). These methods all trigger the initial handshake.
trans-unit.target: 一个 SSLEngine 通过调用创建 SSLContext.createSSLEngine() 从一个初始化 SSLContext 。任何配置参数应使得在第一次调用之前设置 wrap() ， unwrap() 或 beginHandshake() 。这些方法都触发初始握手。

trans-unit.source: An SSLEngine using this session may generate SSL/TLS/DTLS packets of any size up to and including the value returned by this method. All SSLEngine network buffers should be sized at least this large to avoid insufficient space problems when performing wrap and unwrap calls.
trans-unit.target: 使用此会话的 SSLEngine 可以生成SSL / TLS / DTLS数据包，该数据包的大小最大为（包括）此方法返回的值。所有 SSLEngine 网络缓冲区的大小均应至少如此之大，以避免在执行 wrap 和 unwrap 调用时出现空间不足的问题。

trans-unit.source: An SSLEngineResult enum describing the current handshaking state of this SSLEngine.
trans-unit.target: 一个 SSLEngineResult 枚举，描述此 SSLEngine 的当前握手状态。

trans-unit.source: An SSLEngineResult enum describing the overall result of the SSLEngine operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个 SSLEngineResult 枚举，描述 SSLEngine 操作的整体结果。

trans-unit.source: An SSLEngineResult enum describing the overall result of the SSLEngine operation. The Status value does not reflect the state of a SSLEngine handshake currently in progress. The SSLEngineResult's HandshakeStatus should be consulted for that information.
trans-unit.target: 一个 SSLEngineResult 枚举，描述 SSLEngine 操作的整体结果。的 Status 值不反映的状态 SSLEngine 的当前正在进行的握手。将 SSLEngineResult's HandshakeStatus 应该参考的信息。

trans-unit.source: An SSLServerSocket contains several pieces of state data which are inherited by the SSLSocket at socket creation. These include the enabled cipher suites and protocols, whether client authentication is necessary, and whether created sockets should begin handshaking in client or server mode. The state inherited by the created SSLSocket can be overridden by calling the appropriate methods.
trans-unit.target: 一个 SSLServerSocket 包含几条状态数据，它们由继承 SSLSocket 在套接字创建。其中包括启用的密码套件和协议，是否需要客户端身份验证以及创建的套接字是否应以客户端或服务器模式开始握手。创建的 SSLSocket 继承的状态可以通过调用适当的方法来覆盖。

trans-unit.source: An SSLServerSocket contains several pieces of state data which are inherited by the SSLSocket at socket creation. These include the enabled cipher suites and protocols, whether client authentication is necessary, and whether created sockets should begin handshaking in client or server mode. The state inherited by the created SSLSocket can be overriden by calling the appropriate methods.
trans-unit.target: 一个 SSLServerSocket 包含几条状态数据，它们由继承 SSLSocket 在套接字创建。其中包括启用的密码套件和协议，是否需要客户端身份验证以及创建的套接字是否应以客户端或服务器模式开始握手。创建的 SSLSocket 继承的状态可以通过调用适当的方法来覆盖。

trans-unit.source: An SctpMultiChannel can control more than one association, the association parameter must be given when setting or retrieving this option.
trans-unit.target: 一个 SctpMultiChannel 可以控制多个关联，在设置或检索此选项时必须提供关联参数。

trans-unit.source: An ServerNotActiveException is an Exception thrown during a call to RemoteServer.getClientHost if the getClientHost method is called outside of servicing a remote method call.
trans-unit.target: 一个 ServerNotActiveException 是一个 Exception ，以在呼叫期间抛出 RemoteServer.getClientHost 的如果getClientHost方法，称为服务远程方法调用的外部。

trans-unit.source: An SslRMIClientSocketFactory instance is used by the RMI runtime in order to obtain client sockets for RMI calls via SSL.
trans-unit.target: 一个 SslRMIClientSocketFactory 实例，以获得客户端套接字的RMI通过SSL调用使用RMI运行时。

trans-unit.source: An SslRMIServerSocketFactory instance is used by the RMI runtime in order to obtain server sockets for RMI calls via SSL.
trans-unit.target: 一个 SslRMIServerSocketFactory 实例，以便获得服务器套接字的RMI通过SSL调用使用RMI运行时。

trans-unit.source: An UndeclaredThrowableException instance contains the undeclared checked exception that was thrown by the invocation handler, and it can be retrieved with the getUndeclaredThrowable() method. UndeclaredThrowableException extends RuntimeException, so it is an unchecked exception that wraps a checked exception.
trans-unit.target: 一个 UndeclaredThrowableException 中实例包含由调用处理程序抛出的未申报检查异常，并且它可以与被检索 getUndeclaredThrowable() 方法。 UndeclaredThrowableException 扩展了 RuntimeException ，因此它是一个未检查的异常，它包装了一个检查的异常。

trans-unit.source: An UndoableEdit represents an edit.
trans-unit.target: 一个 UndoableEdit 中的代表编辑。

trans-unit.source: An UndoableEdit represents an edit. The edit may be undone, or if already undone the edit may be redone.
trans-unit.target: 一个 UndoableEdit 中的代表编辑。可以撤消编辑，或者如果已经撤消，则可以重做。

trans-unit.source: An UndoableEditListener method.
trans-unit.target: 一个 UndoableEditListener 该方法。

trans-unit.source: An UndoableEditListener method. This invokes addEdit with e.getEdit().
trans-unit.target: 一个 UndoableEditListener 该方法。这 addEdit 使用 e.getEdit() 调用addEdit。

trans-unit.source: An UnexpectedException is thrown if the client of a remote method call receives, as a result of the call, a checked exception that is not among the checked exception types declared in the throws clause of the method in the remote interface.
trans-unit.target: 一个 UnexpectedException 如果远程方法调用的客户端接收被抛出，如呼叫，检查异常不属于检查的异常类型中声明的结果 throws 在远程接口的方法的子句。

trans-unit.source: An UnknownGroupException is thrown by methods of classes and interfaces in the java.rmi.activation package when the ActivationGroupID parameter to the method is determined to be invalid, i.e., not known by the ActivationSystem.
trans-unit.target: 一个 UnknownGroupException 通过在类和接口方法抛出 java.rmi.activation 包时 ActivationGroupID 方法参数的方法被确定为是无效的，即，不通过已知 ActivationSystem 。

trans-unit.source: An UnknownGroupException is thrown by methods of classes and interfaces in the java.rmi.activation package when the ActivationGroupID parameter to the method is determined to be invalid, i.e., not known by the ActivationSystem. An UnknownGroupException is also thrown if the ActivationGroupID in an ActivationDesc refers to a group that is not registered with the ActivationSystem
trans-unit.target: 一个 UnknownGroupException 通过在类和接口方法抛出 java.rmi.activation 包时 ActivationGroupID 方法参数的方法被确定为是无效的，即，不通过已知 ActivationSystem 。一个 UnknownGroupException 也抛出如果 ActivationGroupID 方法在 ActivationDesc 指的是与所登记的一组 ActivationSystem

trans-unit.source: An UnknownHostException is thrown if a java.net.UnknownHostException occurs while creating a connection to the remote host for a remote method call.
trans-unit.target: 一个 UnknownHostException 如果被抛出 java.net.UnknownHostException ，同时为一个远程方法调用到远程主机的连接发生。

trans-unit.source: An UnknownObjectException is thrown by methods of classes and interfaces in the java.rmi.activation package when the ActivationID parameter to the method is determined to be invalid.
trans-unit.target: 一个 UnknownObjectException 通过在类和接口方法抛出 java.rmi.activation 包时 ActivationID 参数的方法被确定为是无效的。

trans-unit.source: An UnknownObjectException is thrown by methods of classes and interfaces in the java.rmi.activation package when the ActivationID parameter to the method is determined to be invalid. An ActivationID is invalid if it is not currently known by the ActivationSystem. An ActivationID is obtained by the ActivationSystem.registerObject method. An ActivationID is also obtained during the Activatable.register call.
trans-unit.target: 一个 UnknownObjectException 通过在类和接口方法抛出 java.rmi.activation 包时 ActivationID 参数的方法被确定为是无效的。如果 ActivationID 当前未知，那么 ActivationSystem 无效。一个 ActivationID 通过将获得 ActivationSystem.registerObject 方法。在 Activatable.register 调用期间也会获得一个 ActivationID 。

trans-unit.source: An UnmarshalException can be thrown while unmarshalling the parameters or results of a remote method call if any of the following conditions occur:
trans-unit.target: 如果发生以下任何一种情况，则在 UnmarshalException 编组参数或远程方法调用的结果时会引发UnmarshalException：

trans-unit.source: An UnmarshalException can be thrown while unmarshalling the parameters or results of a remote method call if any of the following conditions occur: if an exception occurs while unmarshalling the call header if the protocol for the return value is invalid if a java.io.IOException occurs unmarshalling parameters (on the server side) or the return value (on the client side).
trans-unit.target: 如果发生以下任何一种情况，则在 UnmarshalException 编组参数或远程方法调用的结果时会引发UnmarshalException：如果在编组调用标头时发生异常，并且如果返回值的协议无效，则发生 java.io.IOException 。解组参数（在服务器端）或返回值（在客户端）。

trans-unit.source: An UnsupportedAudioFileException is an exception indicating that an operation failed because a file did not contain valid data of a recognized file type and format.
trans-unit.target: 一个 UnsupportedAudioFileException 是指示操作失败，因为文件没有包含可识别文件类型和格式的有效数据的异常。

trans-unit.target: 一个 XMLSignatureException 可以包含一个原因：导致此另一个抛出 XMLSignatureException 得到抛出。

trans-unit.target: 一个 XPathFactory 实例可用于创建 XPath 的对象。

trans-unit.target: 一个 XPathFactory 实例可用于创建 XPath 的对象。

trans-unit.source: An XmlReader object is registered as the XML reader for a WebRowSet by being assigned to the rowset's xmlReader field. When the WebRowSet object's readXml method is invoked, it in turn invokes its XML reader's readXML method.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 XmlReader 对象分配给行集的 xmlReader 字段，将其注册为 WebRowSet 的XML阅读器。当 WebRowSet 对象的 readXml 方法被调用时，它依次调用其XML阅读器的 readXML 方法。

trans-unit.source: An int array containing information about a column of pixels.
trans-unit.target: 一个 int 数组，其中包含有关像素列的信息。

trans-unit.target: 一个 int 数组，其中包含有关一行像素的信息。

trans-unit.source: An int array in which elements may be updated atomically.
trans-unit.target: 一个 int 数组，其中的元素可以原子更新。

trans-unit.target: 一个 int 数组，其中的元素可以原子更新。有关原子访问的属性的描述，请参见 VarHandle 规范。

trans-unit.source: An int representing a "copy" action.
trans-unit.target: 表示“复制”动作的 int 。

trans-unit.source: An int representing a "copy" or "move" action.
trans-unit.target: 表示“复制”或“移动”动作的 int 。

trans-unit.source: An int representing a "copy" transfer action.
trans-unit.target: 表示“复制”传输动作的 int 。

trans-unit.source: An int representing a "copy" transfer action. This value is used when data is copied to a clipboard or copied elsewhere in a drag and drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示“复制”传输动作的 int 。当将数据复制到剪贴板或通过拖放操作复制到其他位置时，将使用此值。

trans-unit.source: An int representing a "link" action.
trans-unit.target: 表示“链接”操作的 int 。

trans-unit.source: An int representing a "link" action. The link verb is found in many, if not all native DnD platforms, and the actual interpretation of LINK semantics is both platform and application dependent. Broadly speaking, the semantic is "do not copy, or move the operand, but create a reference to it". Defining the meaning of "reference" is where ambiguity is introduced. The verb is provided for completeness, but its use is not recommended for DnD operations between logically distinct applications where misinterpretation of the operations semantics could lead to confusing results for the user.
trans-unit.target: 表示“链接”操作的 int 。链接动词可以在许多（即使不是全部）本地DnD平台中找到，并且LINK语义的实际解释取决于平台和应用程序。广义地说，语义是“不要复制或移动操作数，而要创建对它的引用”。定义“引用”的含义是引入歧义的地方。提供该动词是为了完整性，但不建议在逻辑上不同的应用程序之间的DnD操作中使用该动词，因为操作语义上的误解可能会使用户感到困惑。

trans-unit.source: An int representing a "link" transfer action.
trans-unit.target: 表示“链接”传输动作的 int 。

trans-unit.source: An int representing a "link" transfer action. This value is used to specify that data should be linked in a drag and drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示“链接”传输动作的 int 。该值用于指定在拖放操作中应该链接数据。

trans-unit.source: An int representing a "move" action.
trans-unit.target: 表示“移动”动作的 int 。

trans-unit.source: An int representing a "move" transfer action.
trans-unit.target: 表示“移动”转移动作的 int 。

trans-unit.source: An int representing a "move" transfer action. This value is used when data is moved to a clipboard (i.e. a cut) or moved elsewhere in a drag and drop operation.

trans-unit.source: An int value that may be updated atomically.
trans-unit.target: 一个可以自动更新的 int 值。

trans-unit.source: An int value that may be updated atomically. See the VarHandle specification for descriptions of the properties of atomic accesses. An AtomicInteger is used in applications such as atomically incremented counters, and cannot be used as a replacement for an Integer. However, this class does extend Number to allow uniform access by tools and utilities that deal with numerically-based classes.
trans-unit.target: 一个可以自动更新的 int 值。有关原子访问的属性的描述，请参见 VarHandle 规范。一个 AtomicInteger 在应用，如原子递增计数器使用，并且不能被用作用于替代 Integer 。但是，此类确实扩展了 Number ,以允许处理基于数字的类的工具和实用程序进行统一访问。

trans-unit.source: An int value that may be updated atomically. See the java.util.concurrent.atomic package specification for description of the properties of atomic variables. An AtomicInteger is used in applications such as atomically incremented counters, and cannot be used as a replacement for an Integer. However, this class does extend Number to allow uniform access by tools and utilities that deal with numerically-based classes.
trans-unit.target: 一个可以自动更新的 int 值。有关原子变量的属性的描述，请参见 java.util.concurrent.atomic 包规范。一个 AtomicInteger 在应用，如原子递增计数器使用，并且不能被用作用于替代 Integer 。但是，此类确实扩展了 Number ,以允许处理基于数字的类的工具和实用程序进行统一访问。

trans-unit.source: An invokedynamic instruction is linked just before its first execution. A dynamically-computed constant is resolved just before the first time it is used (by pushing it on the stack or linking it as a bootstrap method parameter). The bootstrap method call implementing the linkage occurs within a thread that is attempting a first execution or first use.
trans-unit.target: 一个 invokedynamic 指令，只是它第一次执行之前被链接。动态计算的常量将在首次使用它之前进行解析（通过将其压入堆栈或将其作为引导方法参数进行链接）。实现链接的引导方法调用发生在尝试首次执行或首次使用的线程内。

trans-unit.source: An invokedynamic instruction is originally in an unlinked state. In this state, there is no target method for the instruction to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 一个 invokedynamic 指令原本是在断开连接的状态。在这种状态下，该指令没有目标方法可以调用。

trans-unit.source: An MXBean is a variant of Standard MBean where complex types are mapped to a standard set of types defined in the javax.management.openmbean package. MXBeans are appropriate if you would otherwise need to reference application-specific classes in your MBean interface. They are described in detail in the specification for MXBean.
trans-unit.target: 一个的MXBean是标准MBean的一个变型，其中复杂的类型映射到一组标准中定义的类型 javax.management.openmbean 包。如果您否则需要在MBean接口中引用特定于应用程序的类，则MXBean是合适的。在 MXBean 规范中对它们进行了详细描述。

trans-unit.source: An Open MBean is a kind of Dynamic MBean where the types of attributes and of operation parameters and return values are built using a small set of predefined Java classes. Open MBeans facilitate operation with remote management programs that do not necessarily have access to application-specific types, including non-Java programs. Open MBeans are defined by the package javax.management.openmbean.
trans-unit.target: 一个开放的MBean是一种Dynamic MBean，其中的属性类型和操作参数和返回值是使用一小部分预定义的Java类的构建。开放式MBean有助于使用不一定必须访问特定于应用程序的类型（包括非Java程序）的远程管理程序进行操作。开放MBean由包 javax.management.openmbean 定义。

trans-unit.source: An offset value can be specified. When an observed value exceeds its threshold, the threshold is incremented by the offset, or by a multiple of the offset sufficient to make the threshold greater than the new observed value.
trans-unit.target: 一个偏移值可以被指定。当观察值超过其阈值时，将阈值增加偏移量，或者以足以使阈值大于新观察值的偏移量的倍数递增。

trans-unit.source: An unquoted value is a possibly empty string of characters which may not contain any of the characters comma, equals, colon, or quote.
trans-unit.target: 一个无引号值是可以不包含任意逗号，平等，结肠，或报价的字符的可能为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: An ACL can be thought of as a data structure with multiple ACL entries. Each ACL entry, of interface type AclEntry, contains a set of permissions associated with a particular principal. (A principal represents an entity such as an individual user or a group). Additionally, each ACL entry is specified as being either positive or negative. If positive, the permissions are to be granted to the associated principal. If negative, the permissions are to be denied.
trans-unit.target: 一个ACL可以被认为是一个有多个ACL条目的数据结构。每一个ACL条目,接口类型为AclEntry,都包含一组与某一特定委托人相关联的权限(一个委托人代表一个实体,如单个用户或组)。(一个 principal 代表一个实体,如单个用户或组)。此外,每个ACL条目被指定为正或负。如果是正值,则该权限将被授予相关的Principal。如果是负值,则拒绝授予相关的委托人权限,如果是正值,则拒绝授予相关的委托人权限。

trans-unit.source: An ACL can be thought of as a data structure with multiple ACL entry objects. Each ACL entry object contains a set of permissions associated with a particular principal. (A principal represents an entity such as an individual user or a group). Additionally, each ACL entry is specified as being either positive or negative. If positive, the permissions are to be granted to the associated principal. If negative, the permissions are to be denied. Each principal can have at most one positive ACL entry and one negative entry; that is, multiple positive or negative ACL entries are not allowed for any principal. Note: ACL entries are by default positive. An entry becomes a negative entry only if the setNegativePermissions method is called on it.
trans-unit.target: 可以将ACL视为具有多个ACL条目对象的数据结构。每个ACL条目对象都包含一组与特定主体相关联的权限。 （委托人代表一个实体，例如单个用户或组）。此外，每个ACL条目都指定为正数或负数。如果为正，则将权限授予关联的主体。如果为否，则将拒绝该权限。每个主体最多可以有一个肯定的ACL条目和一个否定的条目；也就是说，任何主体都不允许使用多个肯定或否定ACL条目。注意：默认情况下，ACL条目为正。仅当调用 setNegativePermissions 方法时，该条目才成为否定条目。

trans-unit.source: An ACL can be thought of as a data structure with multiple ACL entry objects. Each ACL entry object contains a set of permissions associated with a particular principal. (A principal represents an entity such as an individual user or a group). Additionally, each ACL entry is specified as being either positive or negative. If positive, the permissions are to be granted to the associated principal. If negative, the permissions are to be denied. Each principal can have at most one positive ACL entry and one negative entry; that is, multiple positive or negative ACL entries are not allowed for any principal. Note: ACL entries are by default positive. An entry becomes a negative entry only if the setNegativePermissions method is called on it.
trans-unit.target: 可以将ACL视为具有多个ACL条目对象的数据结构。每个ACL条目对象都包含一组与特定主体相关联的权限。 （委托人代表一个实体，例如单个用户或组）。此外，每个ACL条目都指定为正数或负数。如果为正，则将权限授予关联的主体。如果为否，则拒绝权限。每个主体最多可以有一个肯定的ACL条目和一个否定的条目；也就是说，任何主体都不允许使用多个肯定或否定ACL条目。注意：默认情况下，ACL条目为正。仅当调用 setNegativePermissions 方法时，该条目才成为否定条目。

trans-unit.source: An Action implementation useful for key bindings that are shared across a number of different text components.
trans-unit.target: 一个Action的实现,适用于多个不同文本组件共享的键绑定。

trans-unit.source: An Action implementation useful for key bindings that are shared across a number of different text components. Because the action is shared, it must have a way of getting it's target to act upon. This class provides support to try and find a text component to operate on. The preferred way of getting the component to act upon is through the ActionEvent that is received. If the Object returned by getSource can be narrowed to a text component, it will be used. If the action event is null or can't be narrowed, the last focused text component is tried. This is determined by being used in conjunction with a JTextController which arranges to share that information with a TextAction.
trans-unit.target: 一个Action实现,适用于多个不同文本组件共享的键绑定。因为Action是共享的,所以它必须有一种方法来获取它的目标来操作。这个类提供了支持来尝试并找到一个文本组件来操作。获取组件操作的首选方式是通过接收到的ActionEvent。如果getSource返回的Object可以缩小到一个文本组件,就会被使用。如果动作事件为空或无法缩小范围,则尝试最后一个聚焦的文本组件。这是由与JTextController一起使用来决定的,JTextController安排与TextAction共享该信息。

trans-unit.target: 一个AttributedString保存着文本和相关属性信息。

trans-unit.target: 一个AttributedString保存着文本和相关属性信息。在某些情况下,它可以被用作实际的数据存储,在这些情况下,文本阅读器希望通过AttributedCharacterIterator接口访问属性文本。

trans-unit.source: An EdEC point is specified by its y-coordinate value and a boolean that indicates whether the x-coordinate is odd. The y-coordinate is an element of the field of integers modulo some value p that is determined by the algorithm parameters. This field element is represented by a BigInteger, and implementations that consume objects of this class may reject integer values which are not in the range [0, p).
trans-unit.target: EdEC点由其y坐标值和一个布尔值指定，该布尔值指示x坐标是否为奇数。y坐标是整数字段的元素，该字段对由算法参数确定的某个值p取模。此字段元素由 BigInteger 表示，使用此类的对象的实现可能会拒绝不在[0，p）范围内的整数值。

trans-unit.source: An EditorKit has the ability to be read and save documents. It is generally the most pleasing to users if there is no loss of data between the two operation. The policy of the HTMLEditorKit will be to store things not recognized or not necessarily visible so they can be subsequently written out. The model of the HTML document should therefore contain all information discovered while reading the document. This is constrained in some ways by the need to support editing (i.e. incorrect documents sometimes must be normalized). The guiding principle is that information shouldn't be lost, but some might be synthesized to produce a more correct model or it might be rearranged.
trans-unit.target: 一个EditorKit具有被读取和保存文档的功能。一般来说,如果在这两种操作之间没有数据的丢失,是最让用户满意的。HTMLEditorKit的政策将是存储不被识别或不一定可见的东西,以便随后可以写出来。因此,HTML文档的模型应该包含阅读文档时发现的所有信息。这在某种程度上受到了支持编辑的需要的限制(即有时必须对不正确的文档进行规范化处理)。指导原则是,信息不应该丢失,但有些信息可能会被合成以产生一个更正确的模型,或者可能会被重新排列。

trans-unit.source: An Edwards-Curve private key is a bit string. This interface only supports bit string lengths that are a multiple of 8, and the key is represented using a byte array.
trans-unit.target: Edwards-Curve私钥是一个位串。这个接口只支持比特串长度是8的倍数,密钥使用字节数组表示。

trans-unit.source: An Edwards-Curve public key is a point on the curve, which is represented using an EdECPoint.
trans-unit.target: Edwards-Curve公钥是曲线上的一个点,它用EdECPoint表示。

trans-unit.source: An Element represents a specific region in a Document that begins with startOffset and ends just before endOffset. The start offset of a branch Element is usually the start offset of its first child. Similarly, the end offset of a branch Element is usually the end offset of its last child.
trans-unit.target: 元素代表文档中从startOffset开始到endOffset之前的特定区域。分支元素的起始偏移量通常是其第一个子元素的起始偏移量。同样,一个分支元素的结束偏移量通常是其最后一个子元素的结束偏移量。

trans-unit.source: An HTML reader to load an HTML document with an HTML element structure. This is a set of callbacks from the parser, implemented to create a set of elements tagged with attributes. The parse builds up tokens (ElementSpec) that describe the element subtree desired, and burst it into the document under the protection of a write lock using the insert method on the document outer class.

trans-unit.source: An HTTP header name may appear more than once in the HTTP protocol. As such, headers are represented as a name and a list of values. Each occurrence of a header value is added verbatim, to the appropriate header name list, without interpreting its value. In particular, HttpHeaders does not perform any splitting or joining of comma separated header value strings. The order of elements in a header value list is preserved when building a request. For responses, the order of elements in a header value list is the order in which they were received. The Map returned by the map method, however, does not provide any guarantee with regard to the ordering of its entries.
trans-unit.target: HTTP标头名称在HTTP协议中可能会出现多次。因此，标头表示为名称和值列表。标题值的每次出现都会逐字添加到相应的标题名称列表中，而无需解释其值。特别是， HttpHeaders 不会对逗号分隔的标头值字符串进行任何拆分或合并。当在报头值列表中的元素的顺序被保存 building 的请求。对于响应，标头值列表中元素的顺序是它们接收的顺序。但是，由 map 方法返回的 Map 对其条目的顺序不提供任何保证。
