trans-unit.source: An ICC_ColorSpace object can be constructed from an appropriate ICC_Profile. Typically, an ICC_ColorSpace would be associated with an ICC Profile which is either an input, display, or output profile (see the ICC specification). There are also device link, abstract, color space conversion, and named color profiles. These are less useful for tagging a color or image, but are useful for other purposes (in particular device link profiles can provide improved performance for converting from one device's color space to another's).
trans-unit.target: 一个ICC_ColorSpace对象可以从一个适当的ICC_Profile中构造出来。通常情况下,ICC_ColorSpace会与ICC Profile相关联,ICC Profile可以是输入、显示或输出配置文件(参见ICC规范)。此外,还有设备链接、抽象、色彩空间转换和命名色彩配置文件。这些对于标记颜色或图像不太有用,但对于其他目的是有用的(特别是设备链接配置文件可以为从一个设备的颜色空间转换到另一个设备的颜色空间提供更好的性能)。

trans-unit.source: An IP address is either a 32-bit or 128-bit unsigned number used by IP, a lower-level protocol on which protocols like UDP and TCP are built. The IP address architecture is defined by RFC 790: Assigned Numbers, RFC 1918: Address Allocation for Private Internets, RFC 2365: Administratively Scoped IP Multicast, and RFC 2373: IP Version 6 Addressing Architecture. An instance of an InetAddress consists of an IP address and possibly its corresponding host name (depending on whether it is constructed with a host name or whether it has already done reverse host name resolution).
trans-unit.target: IP地址是IP使用的32位或128位无符号数字，IP是构建诸如UDP和TCP之类的协议的较低级别协议。 IP地址体系结构由RFC 790：分配的编号，RFC 1918：专用Internet的地址分配，RFC 2365：管理范围内的IP多播和RFC 2373：IP版本6寻址体系结构定义。一个InetAddress的实例由一个IP地址以及可能的相应主机名组成（取决于它是用主机名构造还是已经进行了反向主机名解析）。

trans-unit.source: An IP address is either a 32-bit or 128-bit unsigned number used by IP, a lower-level protocol on which protocols like UDP and TCP are built. The IP address architecture is defined by RFC 790: Assigned Numbers, RFC 1918: Address Allocation for Private Internets, RFC 2365: Administratively Scoped IP Multicast, and RFC 2373: IP Version 6 Addressing Architecture. An instance of an InetAddress consists of an IP address and possibly its corresponding host name (depending on whether it is constructed with a host name or whether it has already done reverse host name resolution).
trans-unit.target: IP地址是IP使用的32位或128位无符号数字，IP是在其上构建诸如UDP和TCP之类的协议的较低级别协议。 IP地址体系结构由RFC 790：分配的编号，RFC 1918：专用Internet的地址分配，RFC 2365：管理范围内的IP多播和RFC 2373：IP版本6寻址体系结构定义。一个InetAddress的实例由一个IP地址以及可能的相应主机名组成（取决于它是用主机名构造还是已经进行了反向主机名解析）。

trans-unit.source: An IPv6 address enclosed in square brackets ('[' and ']') and consisting of hexadecimal digits, colon characters (':'), and possibly an embedded IPv4 address. The full syntax of IPv6 addresses is specified in RFC 2373: IPv6 Addressing Architecture.
trans-unit.target: 括在方括号（ '[' 和 ']' ）中的IPv6地址，该地址由十六进制数字，冒号（ ':' ）以及可能的嵌入式IPv4地址组成。IPv6地址的完整语法在RFC 2373：IPv6地址体系结构中指定。

trans-unit.source: An IPv6 address enclosed in square brackets ('[' and ']') and consisting of hexadecimal digits, colon characters (':'), and possibly an embedded IPv4 address. The full syntax of IPv6 addresses is specified in RFC 2373: IPv6 Addressing Architecture.
trans-unit.target: 括在方括号（ '[' 和 ']' ）中的IPv6地址，该地址由十六进制数字，冒号（ ':' ）以及可能的嵌入式IPv4地址组成。RFC 2373：IPv6寻址体系结构中指定了IPv6地址的完整语法。

trans-unit.source: An Icon wrapper class which implements UIResource.
trans-unit.target: 一个实现UIResource的Icon包装器类。

trans-unit.source: An Icon wrapper class which implements UIResource. UI classes which set icon properties should use this class to wrap any icons specified as defaults. This class delegates all method invocations to the Icon "delegate" object specified at construction.
trans-unit.target: 一个实现UIResource的Icon封装类。设置图标属性的UI类应该使用这个类来包装任何指定为默认值的图标。该类将所有方法的调用委托给在构造时指定的Icon "delegate "对象。

trans-unit.source: An Identity also has a set of certificates (all certifying its own public key). The Principal names specified in these certificates need not be the same, only the key.
trans-unit.target: 一个身份也有一套证书(都是证明自己的公开钥匙)。这些证书中指定的主名不需要相同,只需要密钥。

trans-unit.source: An Identity can be subclassed, to include postal and email addresses, telephone numbers, images of faces and logos, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 一个身份可以被子类化,包括邮政和电子邮件地址、电话号码、脸部图像和标识等。

trans-unit.source: An IdentityScope can contain Identity objects of all kinds, including Signers. All types of Identity objects can be retrieved, added, and removed using the same methods. Note that it is possible, and in fact expected, that different types of identity scopes will apply different policies for their various operations on the various types of Identities.
trans-unit.target: 一个IdentityScope可以包含各种类型的Identity对象,包括签名者。所有类型的Identity对象都可以使用相同的方法进行检索、添加和删除。请注意,不同类型的IdentityScope有可能,事实上也是预期的,它们对不同类型的Identity的各种操作应用不同的策略。

trans-unit.source: An IllegalAccessException is thrown when an application tries to reflectively create an instance (other than an array), set or get a field, or invoke a method, but the currently executing method does not have access to the definition of the specified class, field, method or constructor.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序试图反省创建一个实例(数组除外),设置或获取一个字段,或调用一个方法,但当前执行的方法没有访问指定的类、字段、方法或构造函数的定义时,会抛出IllegalAccessException。

trans-unit.source: An ImageFilter class for cropping images.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于裁剪图像的ImageFilter类。

trans-unit.source: An ImageFilter class for cropping images. This class extends the basic ImageFilter Class to extract a given rectangular region of an existing Image and provide a source for a new image containing just the extracted region. It is meant to be used in conjunction with a FilteredImageSource object to produce cropped versions of existing images.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于裁剪图像的ImageFilter类。该类扩展了基本的ImageFilter类,以提取现有图像的一个给定的矩形区域,并为一个新的图像提供一个只包含提取区域的源。它的目的是与FilteredImageSource对象一起使用,以产生现有图像的裁剪版本。

trans-unit.source: An ImageFilter class for scaling images using a simple area averaging algorithm that produces smoother results than the nearest neighbor algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 一个ImageFilter类,用于使用一个简单的区域平均算法来缩放图像,该算法比最近邻算法产生更平滑的结果。

trans-unit.source: An ImageFilter class for scaling images using the simplest algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 一个ImageFilter类,用于使用最简单的算法对图像进行缩放。

trans-unit.source: An ImageFilter class for scaling images using the simplest algorithm. This class extends the basic ImageFilter Class to scale an existing image and provide a source for a new image containing the resampled image. The pixels in the source image are sampled to produce pixels for an image of the specified size by replicating rows and columns of pixels to scale up or omitting rows and columns of pixels to scale down.
trans-unit.target: 一个使用最简单算法缩放图像的ImageFilter类。该类扩展了基本的ImageFilter类,用于缩放现有的图像,并为包含重新采样图像的新图像提供源。源图像中的像素被采样,通过复制行和列的像素来产生指定大小的图像像素,以放大或省略行和列的像素来缩小图像。

trans-unit.source: An IndexedPropertyDescriptor describes a property that acts like an array and has an indexed read and/or indexed write method to access specific elements of the array.
trans-unit.target: IndexedPropertyDescriptor描述了一个像数组一样的属性,它有一个索引读取和/或索引写入的方法来访问数组的特定元素。

trans-unit.source: An InitialContext instance is not synchronized against concurrent access by multiple threads. Multiple threads each manipulating a different InitialContext instance need not synchronize. Threads that need to access a single InitialContext instance concurrently should synchronize amongst themselves and provide the necessary locking.
trans-unit.target: InitialContext实例不针对多个线程的并发访问进行同步。多个线程各自操作一个不同的InitialContext实例不需要同步。需要并发访问单个InitialContext实例的线程应在它们之间同步,并提供必要的锁定。

trans-unit.source: An InputMethodHighlight is used to describe the highlight attributes of text being composed.
trans-unit.target: InputMethodHighlight用于描述正在组成的文本的高亮属性。

trans-unit.source: An InputMethodHighlight is used to describe the highlight attributes of text being composed. The description can be at two levels: at the abstract level it specifies the conversion state and whether the text is selected; at the concrete level it specifies style attributes used to render the highlight. An InputMethodHighlight must provide the description at the abstract level; it may or may not provide the description at the concrete level. If no concrete style is provided, a renderer should use Toolkit.mapInputMethodHighlight(java.awt.im.InputMethodHighlight) to map to a concrete style.
trans-unit.target: InputMethodHighlight用于描述所组成的文本的高亮属性。描述可以分为两个级别：在抽象级别上，它指定转换状态以及是否选择了文本。在具体级别上，它指定用于呈现突出显示的样式属性。InputMethodHighlight必须提供抽象级别的描述；它可能提供也可能不提供具体级别的描述。如果未提供具体样式，则渲染器应使用 Toolkit.mapInputMethodHighlight(java.awt.im.InputMethodHighlight) 映射到具体样式。

trans-unit.source: An InputSource object belongs to the application: the SAX parser shall never modify it in any way (it may modify a copy if necessary). However, standard processing of both byte and character streams is to close them on as part of end-of-parse cleanup, so applications should not attempt to re-use such streams after they have been handed to a parser.
trans-unit.target: 一个InputSource对象属于应用程序:SAX解析器决不能以任何方式修改它(必要时它可以修改一个副本)。然而,对字节流和字符流的标准处理是作为解析结束清理的一部分而关闭它们,所以应用程序不应该在将这些流交给解析器后试图重新使用它们。

trans-unit.source: An InputSource object describing the new external subset to be used by the parser, or null to indicate that no external subset is provided.
trans-unit.target: 一个InputSource对象,描述解析器要使用的新外部子集,或者null表示没有提供外部子集。

trans-unit.source: An InputSource object describing the new input source to be used by the parser. Returning null directs the parser to resolve the system ID against the base URI and open a connection to resulting URI.
trans-unit.target: 一个InputSource对象,描述新的输入源,供解析器使用。返回null时,解析器将根据基本URI解析系统ID,并打开一个与结果URI的连接。

trans-unit.source: An InputSource object describing the new input source, or null to request that the parser open a regular URI connection to the system identifier.
trans-unit.target: 一个描述新输入源的InputSource对象,或者空值来请求解析器打开一个与系统标识符的常规URI连接。

trans-unit.source: An InputSource, or null if Source can not be converted.
trans-unit.target: 一个InputSource,如果Source不能被转换,则为空。

trans-unit.source: An InputStreamReader is a bridge from byte streams to character streams: It reads bytes and decodes them into characters using a specified charset.
trans-unit.target: InputStreamReader是从字节流到字符流的桥梁：它读取字节，并使用指定的 charset 将它们解码为字符。

trans-unit.source: An InputStreamReader is a bridge from byte streams to character streams: It reads bytes and decodes them into characters using a specified charset. The charset that it uses may be specified by name or may be given explicitly, or the platform's default charset may be accepted.
trans-unit.target: InputStreamReader是从字节流到字符流的桥梁：它读取字节，并使用指定的 charset 将它们解码为字符。它使用的字符集可以按名称指定，也可以显式指定，也可以接受平台的默认字符集。

trans-unit.source: An Integer of 0 if this isn't selected or an Integer of 1 if this is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有选择,则为0的整数,如果选择了,则为1的整数。

trans-unit.source: An Integer of 0.
trans-unit.target: 一个0的整数。

trans-unit.source: An Integer of 1.
trans-unit.target: 一个1的整数。

trans-unit.source: An Integer representing the data type. For JDBCType, the value will be the same value as in Types for the data type.
trans-unit.target: 代表数据类型的整数。对于 JDBCType ，该值将与数据类型的 Types 中的值相同。

trans-unit.source: An Integer representing the vendor specific data type
trans-unit.target: 代表供应商特定数据类型的整数。

trans-unit.source: An InvalidKeyException with a detail message.
trans-unit.target: 一个带有细节信息的InvalidKeyException。

trans-unit.source: An InvalidKeyException with no detail message.
trans-unit.target: 一个没有详细消息的InvalidKeyException。

trans-unit.source: An InvalidOpenTypeException with a detail message.
trans-unit.target: 一个带有细节信息的InvalidOpenTypeException。

trans-unit.source: An InvalidOpenTypeException with no detail message.
trans-unit.target: 一个没有详细消息的InvalidOpenTypeException。

trans-unit.source: An Iterator over String elements is returned in an arbitrary, implementation dependent, order.
trans-unit.target: 以任意依赖于实现的顺序返回String元素上的迭代器。

trans-unit.source: An Iterator specialized for double values.
trans-unit.target: 专门用于 double 精度值的Iterator 。

trans-unit.source: An Iterator specialized for int values.
trans-unit.target: 专用于 int 值的Iterator 。

trans-unit.source: An Iterator specialized for long values.
trans-unit.target: 专用于 long 值的Iterator 。

trans-unit.source: An LDAP DNS provider can be used in environments where the default DNS resolution mechanism is not sufficient to accurately pinpoint the correct LDAP servers needed to perform LDAP operations. For example, in an environment containing a mix of ldap and ldaps servers you may want the LdapContext to query ldaps servers only.
trans-unit.target: 可以在默认DNS解析机制不足以准确查明执行LDAP操作所需的正确LDAP服务器的环境中使用LDAP DNS提供程序。例如，在包含 ldap 和 ldaps 服务器混合的环境中，您可能希望LdapContext仅查询 ldaps 服务器。

trans-unit.source: An LDAP DNS provider is a concrete subclass of this class that has a zero-argument constructor. LDAP DNS providers are located using the ServiceLoader facility, as specified by InitialDirectContext. The ServiceLoader is used to create and register implementations of LdapDnsProvider.
trans-unit.target: LDAP DNS提供程序是此类的具体子类，具有零参数构造函数。LDAP DNS提供程序使用ServiceLoader工具定位，如InitialDirectContext所指定。所述 ServiceLoader 用于创建和登记的实现 LdapDnsProvider 。

trans-unit.source: An LDAP server can send back response controls with an LDAP operation and also with enumeration results, such as those returned by a list or search operation. The LdapContext provides a method (getResponseControls()) for getting the response controls sent with an LDAP operation, while the HasControls interface is used to retrieve response controls associated with enumeration results.
trans-unit.target: LDAP服务器可以使用LDAP操作以及枚举结果（例如由列表或搜索操作返回的枚举结果）发送回响应控件。所述 LdapContext 的提供了一种方法（ getResponseControls() 用于获取与LDAP操作发送的响应控制，而） HasControls 接口用于检索与枚举结果相关联的响应控制。

trans-unit.source: An LDAP service provider for ctx uses a DirStateFactory (indirectly via DirectoryManager.getStateToBind()) and gives it printer and printerAttrs. A factory for an LDAP directory might turn printer into a set of attributes and merge that with printerAttrs. The service provider then uses the resulting attributes to create an LDAP entry and updates the directory.
trans-unit.target: ctx 的LDAP服务提供者使用 DirStateFactory （间接通过 DirectoryManager.getStateToBind() ）并给它提供 printer 和 printerAttrs 。LDAP目录的工厂可能会将 printer 转换为一组属性，并将其与 printerAttrs 合并。然后，服务提供者使用结果属性创建LDAP条目并更新目录。

trans-unit.source: An MBean Server can be accessed remotely through a connector. A connector allows a remote Java application to access an MBean Server in essentially the same way as a local one. The package javax.management.remote defines connectors.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过连接器远程访问MBean服务器。连接器允许远程Java应用程序以与本地Java应用程序基本相同的方式访问MBean服务器。包 javax.management.remote 定义了连接器。

trans-unit.source: An MBean Server can be queried for MBeans whose names match certain patterns and/or whose attributes meet certain constraints. Name patterns are constructed using the ObjectName class and constraints are constructed using the Query class. The methods queryNames and queryMBeans then perform the query.
trans-unit.target: 可以向MBean服务器查询其名称匹配某些模式和/或其属性满足某些约束的MBean。名称模式是使用 ObjectName 类构造的，约束是使用 Query 类构造的。然后，方法 queryNames 和 queryMBeans 执行查询。

trans-unit.source: An MBean Server can be queried for MBeans whose names match certain patterns and/or whose attributes meet certain constraints. Name patterns are constructed using the ObjectName class and constraints are constructed using the Query class. The methods queryNames and queryMBeans then perform the query.
trans-unit.target: 可以向MBean服务器查询其名称匹配某些模式和/或其属性满足某些约束的MBean。名称模式是使用 ObjectName 类构造的，约束是使用 Query 类构造的。然后，方法 queryNames 和 queryMBeans 执行查询。

trans-unit.source: An MBean Server is an object implementing the interface MBeanServer. The most convenient MBean Server to use is the Platform MBean Server. This is a single MBean Server that can be shared by different managed components running within the same Java Virtual Machine. The Platform MBean Server is accessed with the method ManagementFactory.getPlatformMBeanServer().
trans-unit.target: MBean服务器是实现接口 MBeanServer 的对象。最方便使用的MBean Server是Platform MBean Server。这是一个MBean服务器，可以由在同一Java虚拟机中运行的不同托管组件共享。使用方法 ManagementFactory.getPlatformMBeanServer() 访问Platform MBean Server 。

trans-unit.source: An MBean Server is an object implementing the interface MBeanServer. The most convenient MBean Server to use is the Platform MBean Server. This is a single MBean Server that can be shared by different managed components running within the same Java Virtual Machine. The Platform MBean Server is accessed with the method ManagementFactory.getPlatformMBeanServer().
trans-unit.target: MBean服务器是实现接口 MBeanServer 的对象。使用最方便的MBean服务器是Platform MBean Server。这是一个MBean服务器，可以由在同一Java虚拟机中运行的不同托管组件共享。使用方法 ManagementFactory.getPlatformMBeanServer() 访问Platform MBean Server 。

trans-unit.source: An MBean can be a listener for notifications emitted by other MBeans in the same MBean Server. In this case, it implements NotificationListener and the method MBeanServer.addNotificationListener(ObjectName, ObjectName, NotificationFilter, Object) is used to listen.
trans-unit.target: MBean可以是同一MBean服务器中其他MBean发出的通知的侦听器。在这种情况下，它实现了 NotificationListener ,并且使用 MBeanServer.addNotificationListener(ObjectName, ObjectName, NotificationFilter, Object) 方法进行侦听。

trans-unit.source: An MBean can be a listener for notifications emitted by other MBeans in the same MBean Server. In this case, it implements NotificationListener and the method MBeanServer.addNotificationListener(ObjectName, ObjectName, NotificationFilter, Object) is used to listen.
trans-unit.target: MBean可以是同一MBean服务器中其他MBean发出的通知的侦听器。在这种情况下，它实现了 NotificationListener ,并且使用 MBeanServer.addNotificationListener(ObjectName, ObjectName, NotificationFilter, Object) 方法进行侦听。

trans-unit.source: An MBean can implement the MBeanRegistration interface in order to be told when it is registered and unregistered in the MBean Server. Additionally, the preRegister method allows the MBean to get a reference to the MBeanServer object and to get its ObjectName within the MBean Server.
trans-unit.target: MBean可以实现 MBeanRegistration 接口，以告知其在MBean服务器中注册和注销的时间。另外， preRegister 方法允许MBean获取对 MBeanServer 对象的引用，并在MBean服务器中获取其 ObjectName 。

trans-unit.source: An MBean can implement the MBeanRegistration interface in order to be told when it is registered and unregistered in the MBean Server. Additionally, the preRegister method allows the MBean to get a reference to the MBeanServer object and to get its ObjectName within the MBean Server.
trans-unit.target: MBean可以实现 MBeanRegistration 接口，以告知其在MBean服务器中注册和注销的时间。另外， preRegister 方法允许MBean获取对 MBeanServer 对象的引用，并在MBean Server中获取其 ObjectName 。

trans-unit.source: An MBean can perform actions when it is registered in or unregistered from an MBean Server if it implements the MBeanRegistration interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果MBean实现了 MBeanRegistration 接口，则在向MBean服务器注册或从MBean服务器注销时可以执行操作。

trans-unit.source: An MBean that is of a subclass of ClassLoader can be used as a class loader to create other MBeans via the method MBeanServer.createMBean(String, ObjectName, ObjectName, Object[], String[]), and to instantiate arbitrary objects via the method MBeanServer.instantiate(String, ObjectName, Object[], String[]). The MLet class is an example of such an MBean. It is a URLClassLoader, so the list of URLs to load classes from can be configured.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 ClassLoader 子类的MBean作为类加载器，以通过 MBeanServer.createMBean(String, ObjectName, ObjectName, Object[], String[]) 方法创建其他MBean ，并通过该方法实例化任意对象。 MBeanServer.instantiate(String, ObjectName, Object[], String[]) 。所述 MLet 类是这样一个MBean的一个例子。这是一个 URLClassLoader ，因此可以配置从中加载类的URL列表。

trans-unit.source: An MBean that is of a subclass of ClassLoader can be used as a class loader to create other MBeans via the method MBeanServer.createMBean(String, ObjectName, ObjectName, Object[], String[]), and to instantiate arbitrary objects via the method MBeanServer.instantiate(String, ObjectName, Object[], String[]). The MLet class is an example of such an MBean. It is a URLClassLoader, so the list of URLs to load classes from can be configured.
trans-unit.target: 可以将 ClassLoader 子类的MBean 用作类加载器，以通过 MBeanServer.createMBean(String, ObjectName, ObjectName, Object[], String[]) 方法创建其他MBean ，并通过该方法实例化任意对象。 MBeanServer.instantiate(String, ObjectName, Object[], String[]) 。所述 MLet 类是这样一个MBean的一个例子。这是一个 URLClassLoader ，因此可以配置从中加载类的URL列表。

trans-unit.source: An MBean that will emit notifications must implement the NotificationBroadcaster or NotificationEmitter interface. Usually, it does this by subclassing NotificationBroadcasterSupport or delegating to an instance of that class. Here is an example:
trans-unit.target: 将发出通知的MBean必须实现 NotificationBroadcaster 或 NotificationEmitter 接口。通常，它通过将 NotificationBroadcasterSupport 子类化或委托给该类的实例来实现。这是一个例子：

trans-unit.source: An MBean which is not an MBeanServerDelegate may also emit MBeanServerNotifications. In particular, there is a convention for MBeans to emit an MBeanServerNotification for a group of MBeans.
trans-unit.target: 不是 MBeanServerDelegate 的MBean也可能会发出MBeanServerNotifications。特别是，对于MBean，有一个约定为一组MBean发出MBeanServerNotification。

trans-unit.source: An MBean whose management interface is determined by reflection on a Java interface, and that emits notifications.
trans-unit.target: 一个MBean,其管理界面由Java接口上的反射决定,并发出通知。

trans-unit.source: An MBean whose management interface is determined by reflection on a Java interface.
trans-unit.target: 一个MBean,其管理界面由Java接口上的反射决定。

trans-unit.source: An MBeanPermission contains four items of information:
trans-unit.target: 一个MBeanPermission包含四项信息。

trans-unit.source: An MBeanServerNotification emitted to denote the registration or unregistration of a group of MBeans has the following characteristics:
trans-unit.target: 为表示一组MBeans的注册或取消注册而发出的MBeanServerNotification具有以下特征。

trans-unit.source: An MLet that is not added to the ClassLoaderRepository.
trans-unit.target: 没有添加到 ClassLoaderRepository 的MLet 。

trans-unit.source: An MLet that is not added to the ClassLoaderRepository. This class acts exactly like its parent class, MLet, with one exception. When a PrivateMLet is registered in an MBean server, it is not added to that MBean server's ClassLoaderRepository. This is true because this class implements the interface PrivateClassLoader.
trans-unit.target: 没有添加到 ClassLoaderRepository 的MLet 。该类的行为与其父类 MLet 完全相同，但有一个例外。在MBean服务器中注册PrivateMLet时，不会将其添加到该MBean服务器的 ClassLoaderRepository 中。这是正确的，因为此类实现接口 PrivateClassLoader 。

trans-unit.source: An MXBean interface
trans-unit.target: 一个MXBean接口

trans-unit.source: An MXBean interface, or a type referenced within an MXBean interface, can reference another MXBean interface, J. Then opentype(J) is SimpleType.OBJECTNAME and opendata(J) is ObjectName.
trans-unit.target: MXBean接口，或MXBean接口中引用的类型，可以引用另一个MXBean接口，Ĵ。那么opentype（J）是 SimpleType.OBJECTNAME ，opendata（J）是 ObjectName 。

trans-unit.source: An MXBean is a kind of MBean. An MXBean object can be registered directly in the MBean Server, or it can be used as an argument to StandardMBean and the resultant MBean registered in the MBean Server.
trans-unit.target: MXBean是一种MBean。MXBean对象可以直接在MBean服务器中注册，也可以用作 StandardMBean 的参数以及在MBean服务器中注册的结果MBean。

trans-unit.source: An MXBean is a kind of Open MBean, as defined by the javax.management.openmbean package. This means that the types of attributes, operation parameters, and operation return values must all be describable using Open Types, that is the four standard subclasses of OpenType. MXBeans achieve this by mapping Java types into Open Types.
trans-unit.target: MXBean是一种Open MBean，由 javax.management.openmbean 包定义。这意味着必须使用Open Types（即 OpenType 的四个标准子类）来描述属性，操作参数和操作返回值的类型。MXBean通过将Java类型映射为Open Types实现此目的。

trans-unit.source: An MXBean is a type of Open MBean. However, for compatibility reasons, its MBeanInfo is not an OpenMBeanInfo. In particular, when the type of an attribute, parameter, or operation return value is a primitive type such as int, or is void (for a return type), then the attribute, parameter, or operation will be represented respectively by an MBeanAttributeInfo, MBeanParameterInfo, or MBeanOperationInfo whose getType() or getReturnType() returns the primitive name ("int" etc). This is so even though the mapping rules above specify that the opendata mapping is the wrapped type (Integer etc).
trans-unit.target: MXBean是一种Open MBean。但是，出于兼容性原因，其 MBeanInfo 不是 OpenMBeanInfo 。特别是，当属性，参数或操作返回值的类型是基本类型（例如 int ）或为 void （对于返回类型）时，则属性，参数或操作将分别由 MBeanAttributeInfo 表示， MBeanParameterInfo 或 MBeanOperationInfo ,其 getType() 或 getReturnType() 返回原始名称（“ int ”等）。即使上面的映射规则指定了opendata映射是包装类型（ Integer 等）。

trans-unit.source: An MXBean is a type of Open MBean. However, for compatibility reasons, its MBeanInfo is not an OpenMBeanInfo. In particular, when the type of an attribute, parameter, or operation return value is a primitive type such as int, or is void (for a return type), then the attribute, parameter, or operation will be represented respectively by an MBeanAttributeInfo, MBeanParameterInfo, or MBeanOperationInfo whose getType() or getReturnType() returns the primitive name ("int" etc). This is so even though the mapping rules above specify that the opendata mapping is the wrapped type (Integer etc).
trans-unit.target: MXBean是一种Open MBean。但是，出于兼容性原因，其 MBeanInfo 不是 OpenMBeanInfo 。特别是，当属性，参数或操作返回值的类型是基本类型（例如 int ）或为 void （对于返回类型）时，则属性，参数或操作将分别由 MBeanAttributeInfo 表示， MBeanParameterInfo 或 MBeanOperationInfo ,其 getType() 或 getReturnType() 返回原始名称（“ int ”等）。即使上面的映射规则指定了opendata映射是包装类型（ Integer 等）。

trans-unit.source: An NT user only has a domain SID if in fact they are logged into an NT domain. If the user is logged into a workgroup or just a standalone configuration, they will NOT have a domain SID.
trans-unit.target: 只有当NT用户登录到NT域时,他们才会有域SID,如果用户登录到工作组或只是独立配置,他们就不会有域SID。如果用户登录到一个工作组或只是一个独立的配置,他们不会有域SID。

trans-unit.source: An Object containing the new value of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含属性新值的对象。

trans-unit.source: An Object containing the old value of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含属性旧值的对象。

trans-unit.source: An Object may not implement this interface and the BeanContextChild interface (or any subinterfaces thereof) they are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象不可以实现这个接口和BeanContextChild接口(或其任何子接口),它们是相互排斥的。

trans-unit.source: An ObjectInputStream deserializes primitive data and objects previously written using an ObjectOutputStream.
trans-unit.target: ObjectInputStream反序列化之前使用ObjectOutputStream写入的基元数据和对象。

trans-unit.source: An ObjectName can be written as a String with the following elements in order:
trans-unit.target: 一个ObjectName可以写成一个字符串,依次包含以下元素。

trans-unit.source: An ObjectName is a property pattern if it is either a property list pattern or a property value pattern or both.
trans-unit.target: 一个ObjectName是一个属性模式，如果它可以是一个属性列表模式或属性值模式或两者兼而有之。

trans-unit.source: An ObjectName is a property value pattern when at least one of its quoted or unquoted key property values contains the wildcard characters asterisk or question mark as described above. In this case it has one or more keys and associated values, with at least one of the values containing wildcard characters. It matches a nonpattern ObjectName whose domain matches and that contains the same keys whose values match; if the property value pattern is also a property list pattern then the nonpattern ObjectName can contain other keys and values.
trans-unit.target: 如上所述，当ObjectName的带引号或未引号的键属性值中的至少一个包含通配符星号或问号时，它是一种属性值模式。在这种情况下，它具有一个或多个键和关联的值，其中至少一个值包含通配符。它与一个非模式ObjectName匹配，该对象的域匹配并且包含其值匹配的相同键；如果属性值模式也是属性列表模式，则非模式ObjectName可以包含其他键和值。

trans-unit.source: An ObjectName is a pattern if its domain contains a wildcard or if the ObjectName is a property pattern.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个ObjectName的域包含通配符,或者ObjectName是一个属性模式,那么它就是一个模式。

trans-unit.source: An ObjectName may be a property list pattern. In this case it may have zero or more keys and associated values. It matches a nonpattern ObjectName whose domain matches and that contains the same keys and associated values, as well as possibly other keys and values.
trans-unit.target: ObjectName可以是属性列表模式。在这种情况下，它可能具有零个或多个键以及关联的值。它与一个非模式ObjectName匹配，该对象的域匹配并且包含相同的键和关联的值以及可能的其他键和值。

trans-unit.source: An ObjectOutputStream writes primitive data types and graphs of Java objects to an OutputStream.
trans-unit.target: ObjectOutputStream将Java对象的原始数据类型和图形写入一个OutputStream。

trans-unit.source: An ObjectOutputStream writes primitive data types and graphs of Java objects to an OutputStream. The objects can be read (reconstituted) using an ObjectInputStream. Persistent storage of objects can be accomplished by using a file for the stream. If the stream is a network socket stream, the objects can be reconstituted on another host or in another process.
trans-unit.target: ObjectOutputStream将Java对象的原始数据类型和图形写入OutputStream。这些对象可以使用ObjectInputStream来读取(重组)。对象的持久化存储可以通过使用流的文件来完成。如果流是一个网络套接字流,对象可以在另一个主机上或在另一个进程中进行重构。

trans-unit.source: An OpenDataException with a detail message.
trans-unit.target: 一个带有细节信息的OpenDataException。

trans-unit.source: An OpenDataException with no detail message.
trans-unit.target: 一个没有细节信息的OpenDataException。

trans-unit.source: An OutputStreamWriter is a bridge from character streams to byte streams: Characters written to it are encoded into bytes using a specified charset.
trans-unit.target: OutputStreamWriter是从字符流到字节流的桥梁：使用指定的 charset 将写入其中的字符编码为字节。

trans-unit.source: An OutputStreamWriter is a bridge from character streams to byte streams: Characters written to it are encoded into bytes using a specified charset. The charset that it uses may be specified by name or may be given explicitly, or the platform's default charset may be accepted.
trans-unit.target: OutputStreamWriter是从字符流到字节流的桥梁：使用指定的 charset 将写入其中的字符编码为字节。它使用的字符集可以通过名称指定，也可以显式指定，或者可以接受平台的默认字符集。

trans-unit.source: An RMI connector client is usually constructed using JMXConnectorFactory, with a JMXServiceURL that has rmi as its protocol.
trans-unit.target: RMI连接器客户端通常使用构造 JMXConnectorFactory ，具有 JMXServiceURL 具有 rmi 作为其协议。

trans-unit.source: An RMI connector client is usually constructed using JMXConnectorFactory, with a JMXServiceURL that has rmi or iiop as its protocol.
trans-unit.target: RMI连接器客户端通常使用构造 JMXConnectorFactory ，具有 JMXServiceURL 具有 rmi 或 iiop 作为其协议。

trans-unit.source: An RMI connector server can also be created by constructing an instance of RMIConnectorServer, explicitly or through the MBean server's createMBean method.
trans-unit.target: 也可以通过显式构造 RMIConnectorServer 实例或通过MBean服务器的 createMBean 方法来创建RMI连接器服务器。

trans-unit.source: An RMI object representing a connector server.
trans-unit.target: 一个代表连接器服务器的RMI对象。

trans-unit.source: An RMI object representing a connector server. Remote clients can make connections using the newClient(Object) method. This method returns an RMI object representing the connection.
trans-unit.target: 表示连接器服务器的RMI对象。远程客户端可以使用 newClient(Object) 方法建立连接。此方法返回一个代表连接的RMI对象。

trans-unit.source: An RMI object representing a connector server. Remote clients can make connections using the newClient(Object) method. This method returns an RMI object representing the connection.
trans-unit.target: 表示连接器服务器的RMI对象。远程客户端可以使用 newClient(Object) 方法建立连接。此方法返回一个代表连接的RMI对象。

trans-unit.source: An SCTP channel can only control one SCTP association. An SCTPChannel is created by invoking one of the open methods of this class. A newly-created channel is open but not yet connected, that is, there is no association setup with a remote peer. An attempt to invoke an I/O operation upon an unconnected channel will cause a NotYetConnectedException to be thrown. An association can be setup by connecting the channel using one of its connect methods. Once connected, the channel remains connected until it is closed. Whether or not a channel is connected may be determined by invoking getRemoteAddresses.
trans-unit.target: 一个SCTP通道只能控制一个SCTP关联。一个 SCTPChannel 通过调用的一个创造 open 这个类的方法。新创建的通道已打开但尚未连接，也就是说，没有与远程对等方建立关联。尝试在未连接的通道上调用I / O操作将导致引发 NotYetConnectedException 。可以通过使用 connect 方法之一连接通道来建立关联。连接后，通道将保持连接状态，直到关闭为止。可以通过调用 getRemoteAddresses 来确定是否连接了通道。

trans-unit.source: An SCTP channel supports the following notifications: AssociationChangeNotification, PeerAddressChangeNotification, SendFailedNotification, ShutdownNotification, and may support additional implementation specific notifications.
trans-unit.target: SCTP通道支持以下通知： AssociationChangeNotification ， PeerAddressChangeNotification ， SendFailedNotification ， ShutdownNotification ，并且可以支持其他特定于实现的通知。

trans-unit.source: An SCTP multi channel supports many associations on a single socket. An SctpMultiChannel is created by invoking the open method of this class. A newly-created channel is open but not yet bound. An attempt to invoke the receive method of an unbound channel will cause the NotYetBoundException to be thrown. An attempt to invoke the send method of an unbound channel will cause it to first invoke the bind method. The address(es) that the channel's socket is bound to can be retrieved by calling getAllLocalAddresses.
trans-unit.target: SCTP多通道​​在单个套接字上支持许多关联。一个 SctpMultiChannel 通过调用创建 open 这个类的方法。新创建的频道已打开但尚未绑定。尝试调用未绑定通道的 receive 方法将导致抛出 NotYetBoundException 。尝试调用未绑定通道的 send 方法将导致它首先调用 bind 方法。可以通过调用 getAllLocalAddresses 检索通道套接字绑定到的地址。

trans-unit.source: An SQL statement with or without IN parameters can be pre-compiled and stored in a PreparedStatement object. This object can then be used to efficiently execute this statement multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 可以预编译带有或不带有IN参数的SQL语句，并将其存储在 PreparedStatement 对象中。然后可以使用该对象多次有效地执行该语句。

trans-unit.source: An Throwable object, or null.
trans-unit.target: 一个Throwable对象,或者null。

trans-unit.source: An URL for reading the resource, or null if the resource could not be found or the caller doesn't have adequate privileges to get the resource.
trans-unit.target: 用于读取资源的URL,如果找不到资源或调用者没有足够的权限获取资源,则为空。

trans-unit.source: An UndoableEdit used to remember AttributeSet changes to an Element.
trans-unit.target: 一个UndoableEdit,用于记忆元素的属性集变化。

trans-unit.source: An XML Namespace has the properties:
trans-unit.target: 一个XML命名空间具有以下属性:

trans-unit.source: An XML filter is like an XML reader, except that it obtains its events from another XML reader rather than a primary source like an XML document or database. Filters can modify a stream of events as they pass on to the final application.
trans-unit.target: XML 过滤器就像一个 XML 阅读器,除了它从另一个 XML 阅读器而不是像 XML 文档或数据库这样的主要来源获得它的事件。过滤器可以修改事件流,因为它们传递给最终的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: An XML processor may choose to completely expand entities before the structure model is passed to the DOM; in this case there will be no EntityReference nodes in the document tree.
trans-unit.target: XML处理器可以选择在将结构模型传递给DOM之前完全扩展实体。在这种情况下，文档树中将没有 EntityReference 节点。

trans-unit.source: An XMLFilter object, or null if this feature is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 一个XMLFilter对象,如果不支持此功能则为空。

trans-unit.source: An XMLReader will throw this exception when it finds an unrecognized feature or property identifier; SAX applications and extensions may use this class for other, similar purposes.
trans-unit.target: 当XMLReader发现一个未识别的特征或属性标识符时,它将抛出这个异常;SAX应用程序和扩展可以将这个类用于其他类似的目的。

trans-unit.source: An XMLReader will throw this exception when it recognizes a feature or property identifier, but cannot perform the requested operation (setting a state or value). Other SAX2 applications and extensions may use this class for similar purposes.
trans-unit.target: 当XMLReader识别到一个特征或属性标识符,但不能执行请求的操作(设置状态或值)时,它将抛出这个异常。其他SAX2应用程序和扩展可以使用这个类来实现类似的目的。

trans-unit.source: An XMLStreamReader instance is created with an initial event type START_DOCUMENT. At any moment in time, it has a current event that the methods of the interface access and may load the next event through the next() method. The current event type can be determined by getEventType(), and the next returned by the next() method.
trans-unit.target: 使用初始事件类型START_DOCUMENT创建XMLStreamReader实例。在任何时候，接口方法都会访问当前事件，并可能通过 next() 方法加载下一个事件。当前事件类型可以由 getEventType() 确定，下一个事件可以由 next() 方法返回。

trans-unit.source: An XPath expression is composed of a location path and one or more optional predicates. Expressions may also include XPath variables.
trans-unit.target: XPath表达式由位置路径和一个或多个可选谓词组成。表达式也可以包含XPath变量。

trans-unit.source: An XPath expression is not thread-safe and not reentrant. In other words, it is the application's responsibility to make sure that one XPathExpression object is not used from more than one thread at any given time, and while the evaluate method is invoked, applications may not recursively call the evaluate method.
trans-unit.target: XPath表达式不是线程安全的，也不是可重入的。换句话说，确保在任何给定时间不从多个线程使用一个 XPathExpression 对象是应用程序的责任，并且在调用 evaluate 方法时，应用程序可能不会递归地调用 evaluate 方法。

trans-unit.source: An XPath object is not thread-safe and not reentrant. In other words, it is the application's responsibility to make sure that one XPath object is not used from more than one thread at any given time, and while the evaluate method is invoked, applications may not recursively call the evaluate method.
trans-unit.target: XPath对象不是线程安全的，也不是可重入的。换句话说，确保在任何给定时间不从多个线程使用一个 XPath 对象是应用程序的责任，并且在调用 evaluate 方法时，应用程序可能不会递归地调用 evaluate 方法。

trans-unit.source: An absolute path is complete in that it doesn't need to be combined with other path information in order to locate a file.
trans-unit.target: 绝对路径是完整的,因为它不需要与其他路径信息结合起来就能找到一个文件。

trans-unit.source: An absolute, hierarchical URI with a scheme equal to "file", a path representing this abstract pathname, and undefined authority, query, and fragment components
trans-unit.target: 方案的绝对层次结构URI等于 "file" ，表示此抽象路径名的路径以及未定义的权限，查询和片段组件

trans-unit.source: An abstract adapter class for receiving print job events. The methods in this class are empty. This class exists as a convenience for creating listener objects. Extend this class to create a PrintJobEvent listener and override the methods for the events of interest. Unlike the ComponentListener interface, this abstract interface provides empty methods so that you only need to define the methods you need, rather than all of the methods.
trans-unit.target: 用于接收打印作业事件的抽象适配器类。此类中的方法为空。此类的存在是为了方便创建侦听器对象。扩展此类以创建 PrintJobEvent 侦听器，并覆盖感兴趣事件的方法。与 ComponentListener 接口不同，此抽象接口提供了空方法，因此您只需要定义所需的方法即可，而不必定义所有方法。

trans-unit.source: An abstract adapter class for receiving print job events. The methods in this class are empty. This class exists as a convenience for creating listener objects. Extend this class to create a PrintJobEvent listener and override the methods for the events of interest. Unlike the ComponentListener interface, this abstract interface provides null methods so that you only need to define the methods you need, rather than all of the methods.

trans-unit.source: An abstract class to be extended by objects that represent metadata (non-image data) associated with images and streams.
trans-unit.target: 一个抽象类,可由表示与图像和流相关的元数据(非图像数据)的对象扩展。

trans-unit.source: An abstract class to be extended by objects that represent metadata (non-image data) associated with images and streams. Plug-ins represent metadata using opaque, plug-in specific objects. These objects, however, provide the ability to access their internal information as a tree of IIOMetadataNode objects that support the XML DOM interfaces as well as additional interfaces for storing non-textual data and retrieving information about legal data values. The format of such trees is plug-in dependent, but plug-ins may choose to support a plug-in neutral format described below. A single plug-in may support multiple metadata formats, whose names maybe determined by calling getMetadataFormatNames. The plug-in may also support a single special format, referred to as the "native" format, which is designed to encode its metadata losslessly. This format will typically be designed specifically to work with a specific file format, so that images may be loaded and saved in the same format with no loss of metadata, but may be less useful for transferring metadata between an ImageReader and an ImageWriter for different image formats. To convert between two native formats as losslessly as the image file formats will allow, an ImageTranscoder object must be used.
trans-unit.target: 一个抽象类，将由表示与图像和流关联的元数据（非图像数据）的对象扩展。插件使用不透明的插件特定对象表示元数据。但是，这些对象提供了以 IIOMetadataNode 对象树的形式访问其内部信息的能力，这些对象支持XML DOM接口以及用于存储非文本数据和检索有关合法数据值的信息的其他接口。这样的树的格式取决于插件，但是插件可以选择支持下面描述的插件非特定格式。单个插件可以支持多种元数据格式，其名称可以通过调用 getMetadataFormatNames 来确定。。插件还可以支持称为“本机”格式的单个特殊格式，该格式旨在无损地对其元数据进行编码。通常，此格式将专门设计为与特定文件格式配合使用，以便可以以相同的格式加载和保存图像而不会丢失元数据，但是对于在 ImageReader 和 ImageWriter 之间为不同的图像传输元数据可能不太有用。格式。要在两种本机格式之间进行尽可能无损的图像文件格式转换，必须使用 ImageTranscoder 对象。

trans-unit.source: An adapter class that implements ImageProducer to allow the asynchronous production of a RenderableImage.

trans-unit.source: An adapter class that implements ImageProducer to allow the asynchronous production of a RenderableImage. The size of the ImageConsumer is determined by the scale factor of the usr2dev transform in the RenderContext. If the RenderContext is null, the default rendering of the RenderableImage is used. This class implements an asynchronous production that produces the image in one thread at one resolution. This class may be subclassed to implement versions that will render the image using several threads. These threads could render either the same image at progressively better quality, or different sections of the image at a single resolution.
trans-unit.target: 一个实现ImageProducer的适配器类,它允许异步生产RenderableImage。ImageConsumer的大小由RenderContext中的usr2dev变换的比例因子决定。如果RenderContext为空,则使用RenderableImage的默认渲染。该类实现了异步生产,在一个线程中以一个分辨率生成图像。该类可以被子类化,以实现将使用多个线程渲染图像的版本。这些线程可以以逐渐提高的质量渲染同一图像,也可以以单一分辨率渲染图像的不同部分。

trans-unit.source: An additional case occurs with instances of SortedSet and SortedMap. These collections can be created with a Comparator that imposes an ordering on the set elements or map keys. Such a collection is serializable only if the provided Comparator is also serializable.
trans-unit.target: 另一种情况是 SortedSet 和 SortedMap 的实例。可以使用 Comparator 来创建这些集合，该Comparator可以对set元素或map键进行排序。仅当提供的 Comparator 器也可序列化时，此类集合才可序列化。

trans-unit.source: An additional form (compose) allows the construction of computation pipelines from functions returning completion stages.
trans-unit.target: 另一种形式（compose）允许从返回完成阶段的函数构造计算管道。

trans-unit.source: An agent JAR file may have both the Premain-Class and Agent-Class attributes present in the manifest. When the agent is started on the command-line using the -javaagent option then the Premain-Class attribute specifies the name of the agent class and the Agent-Class attribute is ignored. Similarly, if the agent is started sometime after the VM has started, then the Agent-Class attribute specifies the name of the agent class (the value of Premain-Class attribute is ignored).
trans-unit.target: 代理JAR文件在 Premain-Class 可能同时具有Premain-Class和 Agent-Class 属性。当使用 -javaagent 选项在命令行上启动代理时， Premain-Class 属性将指定代理类的名称，而 Agent-Class 属性将被忽略。同样，如果在VM启动后的某个时间启动了 Agent-Class ，则Agent-Class属性将指定代理类的名称（ Premain-Class 属性的值将被忽略）。

trans-unit.source: An agent is deployed as a JAR file. An attribute in the JAR file manifest specifies the agent class which will be loaded to start the agent. Agents can be started in several ways:
trans-unit.target: 代理是以JAR文件的形式部署的。JAR文件清单中的一个属性指定了将被加载以启动代理的代理类。代理可以通过几种方式启动。

trans-unit.source: An agent may be packaged with an application in an executable JAR file.
trans-unit.target: 代理可以和应用程序一起打包在一个可执行的JAR文件中。

trans-unit.source: An annotation is present if it meets the definition of being present given in AnnotatedConstruct. In brief, an annotation is considered present for the purposes of discovery if it is directly present or present via inheritance. An annotation is not considered present by virtue of being wrapped by a container annotation. Operationally, this is equivalent to an annotation being present on an element if and only if it would be included in the results of Elements.getAllAnnotationMirrors(Element) called on that element. Since annotations inside container annotations are not considered present, to properly process repeatable annotation types, processors are advised to include both the repeatable annotation type and its containing annotation type in the set of supported annotation types of a processor.
trans-unit.target: 注释是存在，如果它符合给定存在的定义 AnnotatedConstruct 。简而言之，如果发现注释是直接存在或通过继承存在，则出于发现目的将其视为存在。由于容器注释封装了注释，因此认为该注释不存在。从操作上讲，这等效于且仅当将在 Elements.getAllAnnotationMirrors(Element) 调用的Elements.getAllAnnotationMirrors（Element）的结果中包括该元素时，该元素上才存在一个注释。由于不考虑容器批注中的批注，因此要正确处理可重复的批注类型，建议处理器在处理器支持的注释类型集中同时包含可重复注释类型及其包含的注释类型。

trans-unit.source: An annotation type is considered present if there is at least one annotation of that type present on an element enclosed within the root elements of a round. For this purpose, a type parameter is considered to be enclosed by its generic element. For this purpose, a package element is not considered to enclose the top-level types within that package. (A root element representing a package is created when a package-info file is processed.) Likewise, for this purpose, a module element is not considered to enclose the packages within that module. (A root element representing a module is created when a module-info file is processed.) Annotations on type uses, as opposed to annotations on elements, are ignored when computing whether or not an annotation type is present.
trans-unit.target: 如果在回合的根元素内包含的元素上存在至少一种该类型的注释，则认为该注释类型存在。为此，类型参数被认为由其通用元素包围。为此，不考虑将package元素封装在该包内的顶级类型。 （处理 package-info 文件时，会创建表示软件包的根元素。）同样，出于此目的，不考虑将模块元素封装在该模块中。 （在处理 module-info 文件时，将创建表示模块的根元素。）类型使用的注释与元素上的注释相反，在计算是否存在注释类型时会被忽略。

trans-unit.source: An annotation type is considered present if there is at least one annotation of that type present on an element enclosed within the root elements of a round. This annotation is not used if the annotated class has a corresponding user-defined BeanInfo class, which does not imply the automatic analysis. If both the read and the write methods of the property are annotated, then the read method annotation will have more priority and replace the write method annotation.

trans-unit.source: An application can call the method setConcurrency at any time to change a RowSet object's concurrency.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以随时调用方法 setConcurrency 来更改 RowSet 对象的并发性。

trans-unit.source: An application can continuously monitor its memory usage by calling either the getUsage() method for all memory pools or the isUsageThresholdExceeded() method for those memory pools that support a usage threshold. Below is example code that has a thread dedicated for task distribution and processing. At every interval, it will determine if it should receive and process new tasks based on its memory usage. If the memory usage exceeds its usage threshold, it will redistribute all outstanding tasks to other VMs and stop receiving new tasks until the memory usage returns below its usage threshold.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以通过为所有内存池调用 getUsage() 方法或为那些支持使用率阈值的内存池 isUsageThresholdExceeded() 方法来连续监视其内存使用情况。以下是示例代码，该代码具有专用于任务分发和处理的线程。在每个时间间隔，它将根据其内存使用情况确定是否应该接收和处理新任务。如果内存使用率超过其使用率阈值，它将将所有未完成的任务重新分配给其他VM，并停止接收新任务，直到内存使用率回到其使用率阈值以下。

trans-unit.source: An application can continuously monitor its memory usage by calling either the getUsage() method for all memory pools or the isUsageThresholdExceeded() method for those memory pools that support a usage threshold. Below is example code that has a thread dedicated for task distribution and processing. At every interval, it will determine if it should receive and process new tasks based on its memory usage. If the memory usage exceeds its usage threshold, it will redistribute all outstanding tasks to other VMs and stop receiving new tasks until the memory usage returns below its usage threshold.

It can also retrieve the grade of synchronization with which the provider was implemented and the degree of locking currently in use. In addition, an application has the flexibility to set the degree of locking to be used, which can increase the possibilities for successful synchronization. trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以使用 targetMustExist() 方法来检查 EventContext 是否支持不存在的目标的注册。

trans-unit.source: An application can use the method targetMustExist() to check whether an EventContext supports registration of nonexistent targets.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以使用方法 targetMustExist() 来检查 EventContext 是否支持不存在的目标的注册。

trans-unit.source: An application cannot create its own instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 一个应用程序不能创建自己的这个类的实例。

trans-unit.source: An application does not generally call the getContent method in this class directly. Instead, an application calls the getContent method in class URL or in URLConnection. The application's content handler factory (an instance of a class that implements the interface ContentHandlerFactory set up by a call to setContentHandlerFactory is called with a String giving the MIME type of the object being received on the socket. The factory returns an instance of a subclass of ContentHandler, and its getContent method is called to create the object.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序通常不直接在此类中调用 getContent 方法。而是，应用程序在类 URL 或 URLConnection 中调用 getContent 方法。应用程序的内容处理程序工厂（通过调用 setContentHandlerFactory 来实现实现接口 ContentHandlerFactory 的类的实例，用一个 String 调用，该String给出套接字上要接收的对象的MIME类型。工厂返回的子类的实例。 ContentHandler 及其 getContent 方法被调用以创建对象。

trans-unit.source: An application does not generally call the getContent method in this class directly. Instead, an application calls the getContent method in class URL or in URLConnection. The application's content handler factory (an instance of a class that implements the interface ContentHandlerFactory set up by a call to setContentHandler) is called with a String giving the MIME type of the object being received on the socket. The factory returns an instance of a subclass of ContentHandler, and its getContent method is called to create the object.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序通常不直接在此类中调用 getContent 方法。而是，应用程序在类 URL 或 URLConnection 中调用 getContent 方法。应用程序的内容处理程序工厂（通过调用 setContentHandler 来实现实现接口 ContentHandlerFactory 的类的实例）使用 String 调用，该String给出套接字上要接收的对象的MIME类型。工厂返回 ContentHandler 子类的实例，并调用其 getContent 方法创建对象。

trans-unit.source: An application does not need to do anything special to participate in a distributed transaction. It simply creates connections to the data sources it wants to use via the DataSource.getConnection method, just as it normally does. The transaction manager manages the transaction behind the scenes. The XADataSource interface creates XAConnection objects, and each XAConnection object creates an XAResource object that the transaction manager uses to manage the connection.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序无需执行任何特殊操作即可参与分布式事务。就像通常一样，它只是通过 DataSource.getConnection 方法创建与要使用的数据源的连接。事务管理器在后台管理事务。该 XADataSource 接口创建 XAConnection 对象，每个 XAConnection 对象创建 XAResource 对象，事务管理器用于管理连接。

trans-unit.source: An application implements a CallbackHandler and passes it to underlying security services so that they may interact with the application to retrieve specific authentication data, such as usernames and passwords, or to display certain information, such as error and warning messages.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序实现 CallbackHandler 并将其传递给基础安全服务，以便它们可以与应用程序交互以检索特定的身份验证数据（例如用户名和密码）或显示某些信息（例如错误和警告消息）。

trans-unit.source: An application invokes the static methods of the abstract class PrintServiceLookup to locate print services that have the capabilities to satisfy the application's print request. For example, to print a double-sided document, the application first needs to find printers that have the double-sided printing capability.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序调用抽象类 PrintServiceLookup 的静态方法来查找具有满足应用程序打印请求能力的打印服务。例如，要打印双面文档，应用程序首先需要查找具有双面打印功能的打印机。

trans-unit.source: An application is guaranteed that a read or write operation of up to the number of bytes returned from available() will not block; however, there is no guarantee that attempts to read or write more data will block.
trans-unit.target: 确保应用程序不会阻塞从 available() 返回的最大字节数的读取或写入操作；但是，不能保证读取或写入更多数据的尝试将被阻止。

trans-unit.source: An application is registered to a URI or file type. The mechanism of registering, accessing, and launching the associated application is platform-dependent.
trans-unit.target: 一个应用程序被注册到一个URI或文件类型。注册、访问和启动相关应用程序的机制是依赖于平台的。

trans-unit.source: An application is responsible for updating the system selection whenever the user selects text, using either the mouse or the keyboard. Typically, this is implemented by installing a FocusListener on all Components which support text selection, and, between FOCUS_GAINED and FOCUS_LOST events delivered to that Component, updating the system selection Clipboard when the selection changes inside the Component. Properly updating the system selection ensures that a Java application will interact correctly with native applications and other Java applications running simultaneously on the system. Note that java.awt.TextComponent and javax.swing.text.JTextComponent already adhere to this policy. When using these classes, and their subclasses, developers need not write any additional code.
trans-unit.target: 每当用户使用鼠标或键盘选择文本时，应用程序负责更新系统选择。通常，这是通过安装来实现 FocusListener 上的所有 Component S的支持文本选择，和，之间 FOCUS_GAINED 和 FOCUS_LOST 传递到事件的 Component ，更新系统选择 Clipboard 时，里面的选择更改 Component 。正确更新系统选择可确保Java应用程序将与本机应用程序以及同时在系统上运行的其他Java应用程序正确交互。请注意， java.awt.TextComponent 和 javax.swing.text.JTextComponent 已经遵守此策略。使用这些类及其子类时，开发人员无需编写任何其他代码。

trans-unit.source: An application may choose to catch the SyncProviderException object and retrieve the SyncResolver object it contains. The SyncResolver object lists the conflicts row by row and sets a lock on the data source to avoid further conflicts while the current conflicts are being resolved. Further, for each conflict, it provides methods for examining the conflict and setting the value that should be persisted in the data source. After all conflicts have been resolved, an application must call the acceptChanges method again to write resolved values to the data source. If all of the values in the data source are already the values to be persisted, the method acceptChanges does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以选择捕获 SyncProviderException 对象并检索它包含的 SyncResolver 对象。所述 SyncResolver 对象列表中的冲突通过行和组行的数据源上的锁，以避免进一步的冲突，而目前的冲突被解决。此外，对于每个冲突，它提供了检查冲突和设置应保留在数据源中的值的方法。解决所有冲突之后，应用程序必须再次调用 acceptChanges 方法，以将已解决的值写入数据源。如果数据源中的所有值已经是要 acceptChanges 的值，则方法acceptChanges将不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: An application may customize the contents of a registry as it sees fit, so long as it has the appropriate runtime permission.
trans-unit.target: 只要有适当的运行时权限,应用程序可以根据自己的需要定制注册表的内容。

trans-unit.source: An application may find this information helpful in performance sensitive code.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可能会发现这些信息对性能敏感的代码有帮助。

trans-unit.source: An application may optionally pass in the flavor to be printed. If this is non-null choices presented to the user can be better validated against those supported by the services. An application must pass in a PrintRequestAttributeSet for returning user choices. On calling the PrintRequestAttributeSet may be empty, or may contain application-specified values.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以选择传递要打印的味道。如果这不是 non-null 选项，则可以针对服务支持的选项更好地验证呈现给用户的选择。应用程序必须传入 PrintRequestAttributeSet 才能返回用户选择。调用时， PrintRequestAttributeSet 可以为空，或者可以包含应用程序指定的值。

trans-unit.source: An application may optionally pass in the flavor to be printed. If this is non-null choices presented to the user can be better validated against those supported by the services. An application must pass in a PrintRequestAttributeSet for returning user choices. On calling the PrintRequestAttributeSet may be empty, or may contain application-specified values.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以选择性地传递要打印的味道。如果这个是非空的,则可以更好地根据服务支持的选择来验证提供给用户的选择。应用程序必须传入PrintRequestAttributeSet来返回用户选择。在调用PrintRequestAttributeSet时,PrintRequestAttributeSet可以是空的,也可以包含应用程序指定的值。

trans-unit.source: An application may pass in a PrintService to be initially displayed. A non-null parameter must be included in the array of browsable services. If this parameter is null a service is chosen by the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以传入 PrintService 以进行初始显示。一个 non-null 参数必须包含的可浏览的服务，在数组中。如果此参数为 null ，则实现将选择服务。

trans-unit.source: An application may pass in a PrintService to be initially displayed. A non-null parameter must be included in the array of browsable services. If this parameter is null a service is chosen by the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以传递一个PrintService来进行初始显示。可浏览服务数组中必须包含一个非空参数。如果该参数为空,则会由实现者选择一个服务。

trans-unit.source: An application may set the size and location of an invisible Window arbitrarily, but the window management system may subsequently change its size and/or location when the Window is made visible. One or more ComponentEvents will be generated to indicate the new geometry.

trans-unit.source: An application must assume that the parser can no longer perform normal processing after reporting a fatal error and may stop by throwing a SAXException without calling ContentHandler.endDocument(). In addition, the parser cannot be expected to be able to return accurate information about the logical structure on the rest of the document even if it may be able to resume parsing.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序必须假定解析器在报告致命错误后无法再执行正常处理，并且可能通过抛出 SAXException 而停止而不调用 ContentHandler.endDocument() 。此外，即使可以恢复解析，也不能期望解析器能够返回有关文档其余部分逻辑结构的准确信息。

trans-unit.source: An application must pass in an array of print services to browse. The array must be non-null and non-empty. Typically an application will pass in only PrintServices capable of printing a particular document flavor.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序必须传入一系列打印服务才能浏览。数组必须 non-null 和非空。通常，应用程序将仅传入能够打印特定文档 PrintServices 。

trans-unit.source: An application must pass in an array of print services to browse. The array must be non-null and non-empty. Typically an application will pass in only PrintServices capable of printing a particular document flavor.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序必须传入一个要浏览的打印服务数组。该数组必须是非空的,且为非空。通常情况下,应用程序将只传入能够打印特定文档样式的 PrintServices。

trans-unit.source: An application must subclass the Canvas class in order to get useful functionality such as creating a custom component. The paint method must be overridden in order to perform custom graphics on the canvas.
trans-unit.target: 为了获得有用的功能（例如创建自定义组件），应用程序必须将 Canvas 类子类化。该 paint 方法必须重写，以便在画布上执行自定义图形。

trans-unit.target: 应用程序通过调用 ServiceLoader 的一种静态 load 方法来获取给定服务的服务加载器。如果应用程序是模块，则其模块声明中必须包含一个

trans-unit.target: 应用程序通过调用ServiceLoader的静态 load 方法之一来获取给定服务的服务加载器。如果应用程序是模块，则其模块声明中必须包含一个

trans-unit.source: An application opening a device explicitly with this call has to close the device by calling close(). This is necessary to release system resources and allow applications to exit cleanly.
trans-unit.target: 使用此调用显式打开设备的应用程序必须通过调用 close() 来关闭设备。这是释放系统资源并允许应用程序正常退出所必需的。

trans-unit.source: An application opening a device explicitly with this call has to close the device by calling close(). This is necessary to release system resources and allow applications to exit cleanly.
trans-unit.target: 使用此调用显式打开设备的应用程序必须通过调用 close() 来关闭设备。这是释放系统资源并允许应用程序正常退出所必需的。

trans-unit.source: An application programmer does not use the PooledConnection interface directly; rather, it is used by a middle tier infrastructure that manages the pooling of connections.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序程序员不直接使用 PooledConnection 接口；而是直接使用PooledConnection接口。而是由管理连接池的中间层基础结构使用。

trans-unit.source: An application programmer does not use this interface directly; rather, it is used by a transaction manager working in the middle tier server.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序员并不直接使用这个接口,而是由工作在中间层服务器中的事务管理器使用。

trans-unit.source: An application programmer will not normally call SQLData methods directly, and the SQLInput and SQLOutput methods are called internally by SQLData methods, not by application code.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序程序员通常不会直接调用 SQLData 方法，并且 SQLInput 和 SQLOutput 方法在内部由 SQLData 方法而不是由应用程序代码调用。

trans-unit.source: An application should catch instances of this class only if it must clean up after being terminated asynchronously. If ThreadDeath is caught by a method, it is important that it be rethrown so that the thread actually dies.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序只有在异步终止后必须清除的情况下，才应捕获此类的实例。如果 ThreadDeath 被某个方法捕获，则将其重新抛出以使线程实际死亡很重要。

trans-unit.source: An application should not normally try to catch ThreadDeath unless it must do some extraordinary cleanup operation (note that the throwing of ThreadDeath causes finally clauses of try statements to be executed before the thread officially dies). If a catch clause catches a ThreadDeath object, it is important to rethrow the object so that the thread actually dies.
trans-unit.target: 除非必须执行一些特殊的清除操作，否则应用程序通常不应尝试捕获 ThreadDeath （请注意，抛出 ThreadDeath 会导致 try 语句的 finally 子句在线程正式死亡之前被执行）。如果 catch 子句捕获了 ThreadDeath 对象，则重要的是重新抛出该对象，以便线程实际上死亡。

trans-unit.source: An application starts out by instantiating a GSSManager which then serves as a factory for a security context. An application can use specific principal names and credentials that are also created using the GSSManager; or it can instantiate a context with system defaults. It then goes through a context establishment loop. Once a context is established with the peer, authentication is complete. Data protection such as integrity and confidentiality can then be obtained from this context.
trans-unit.target: 通过实例化 GSSManager 来启动应用程序，然后将其用作安全上下文的工厂。应用程序可以使用同样使用GSSManager创建的特定主体名称和凭据；也可以使用系统默认值实例化上下文。然后，它经历一个上下文建立循环。与对等方建立上下文后，身份验证即告完成。然后可以从该上下文中获得诸如完整性和机密性之类的数据保护。

trans-unit.source: An application that obtains a service loader for a given service is indifferent to whether providers of the service are deployed in modules or packaged as JAR files. The application instantiates service providers via the service loader's iterator, or via Provider objects in the service loader's stream, without knowledge of the service providers' locations.
trans-unit.target: 获取给定服务的服务加载程序的应用程序对于该服务的提供者是部署在模块中还是打包为JAR文件无关紧要。应用程序通过服务加载程序的迭代器或服务加载程序流中的提供 Provider 对象实例化服务提供程序，而无需了解服务提供程序的位置。

trans-unit.source: An application typically does not deal directly with these interfaces. Instead, it deals with classes that implement these interfaces. The application gets these classes either as part of a repertoire of extended operations standardized through the IETF, or from directory vendors for vendor-specific extended operations. The request classes should have constructors that accept arguments in a type-safe and user-friendly manner, while the response classes should have access methods for getting the data of the response in a type-safe and user-friendly manner. Internally, the request/response classes deal with encoding and decoding BER values.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序通常不直接处理这些接口。相反，它处理实现这些接口的类。应用程序将这些类作为通过IETF标准化的扩展操作的一部分，或从目录供应商处获取以特定于供应商的扩展操作。请求类应该具有以类型安全和用户友好的方式接受参数的构造函数，而响应类应该具有以类型安全和用户友好的方式获取响应数据的访问方法。在内部，请求/响应类处理BER值的编码和解码。

trans-unit.source: An application typically does not deal directly with this interface. Instead, it deals with classes that implement this interface. The application gets control classes either as part of a repertoire of controls standardized through the IETF, or from directory vendors for vendor-specific controls. The request control classes should have constructors that accept arguments in a type-safe and user-friendly manner, while the response control classes should have access methods for getting the data of the response in a type-safe and user-friendly manner. Internally, the request/response control classes deal with encoding and decoding BER values.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序通常不直接处理此接口。相反，它处理实现此接口的类。该应用程序可以通过IETF标准化控件集的一部分来获取控件类，也可以从目录供应商那里获得针对特定于控件的控件。请求控制类应具有以类型安全和用户友好的方式接受参数的构造函数，而响应控制类应具有用于以类型安全和用户友好的方式获取响应数据的访问方法。在内部，请求/响应控制类处理BER值的编码和解码。

trans-unit.source: An array of characters or a string can also have an ascent, a descent, and an advance width. The ascent of the array is the maximum ascent of any character in the array. The descent is the maximum descent of any character in the array. The advance width is the sum of the advance widths of each of the characters in the character array. The advance of a String is the distance along the baseline of the String. This distance is the width that should be used for centering or right-aligning the String.
trans-unit.target: 字符数组或字符串也可以具有上升，下降和超前宽度。数组的上升沿是数组中任何字符的最大上升沿。下降是阵列中任何字符的最大下降。超前宽度是字符阵列中每个字符的超前宽度的总和。 String 的前进是沿 String 基线的距离。该距离是应用于将 String 居中或右对齐的宽度。

trans-unit.source: An association exists between two SCTP endpoints. Each endpoint is represented by a list of transport addresses through which that endpoint can be reached and from which it will originate SCTP messages. The association spans over all of the possible source/destination combinations which may be generated from each endpoint's lists of addresses.
trans-unit.target: 两个SCTP端点之间存在关联。每个端点都由一个传输地址列表来表示,通过这个列表可以到达该端点,并从该端点发出SCTP信息。该关联涵盖了所有可能的源/目的组合,这些组合可能从每个端点的地址列表中产生。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous channel group encapsulates the mechanics required to handle the completion of I/O operations initiated by asynchronous channels that are bound to the group. A group has an associated thread pool to which tasks are submitted to handle I/O events and dispatch to completion-handlers that consume the result of asynchronous operations performed on channels in the group. In addition to handling I/O events, the pooled threads may also execute other tasks required to support the execution of asynchronous I/O operations.
trans-unit.target: 异步通道组封装了处理由绑定到该组的 asynchronous channels 启动的I / O操作所需的机制。一个组具有一个关联的线程池，将任务提交给该线程池以处理I / O事件，并将其分配给使用在该组中的通道上执行异步操作的结果的 completion-handlers 。除了处理I / O事件外，池线程还可以执行支持异步I / O操作执行所需的其他任务。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous channel group is created by invoking the withFixedThreadPool or withCachedThreadPool methods defined here. Channels are bound to a group by specifying the group when constructing the channel. The associated thread pool is owned by the group; termination of the group results in the shutdown of the associated thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用此处定义的 withFixedThreadPool 或 withCachedThreadPool 方法来创建异步通道组。通过在构造通道时指定组将通道绑定到组。关联的线程池归该组所有；组的终止将导致关联的线程池关闭。

trans-unit.target: 通过调用此处定义的 withFixedThreadPool 或 withCachedThreadPool 方法来创建异步通道组。通过在构造通道时指定组将通道绑定到组。关联的线程池归该组所有；组的终止将导致关联的线程池关闭。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous channel provider is a concrete subclass of this class that has a zero-argument constructor and implements the abstract methods specified below. The first invocation of that method will locate the default provider as specified below.

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous file channel is created when a file is opened by invoking one of the open methods defined by this class. The file contains a variable-length sequence of bytes that can be read and written and whose current size can be queried. The size of the file increases when bytes are written beyond its current size; the size of the file decreases when it is truncated.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用由此类定义的 open 方法之一打开文件时，将创建一个异步文件通道。该文件包含一个可变长度的字节序列，可以读取和写入这些字节，并且可以 queried 其当前大小。当写入的字节超过其当前大小时，文件的大小会增加；文件的大小在被 truncated 时会减小。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous file channel is created when a file is opened by invoking one of the open methods defined by this class. The size of the file increases when bytes are written beyond its current size; the size of the file decreases when it is truncated.

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous server-socket channel is created by invoking the open method of this class. A newly-created asynchronous server-socket channel is open but not yet bound. It can be bound to a local address and configured to listen for connections by invoking the bind method. Once bound, the accept method is used to initiate the accepting of connections to the channel's socket. An attempt to invoke the accept method on an unbound channel will cause a NotYetBoundException to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 异步服务器套接字通道是通过调用此类的 open 方法创建的。新创建的异步服务器套接字通道已打开，但尚未绑定。它可以绑定到本地地址，并可以通过调用 bind 方法配置为侦听连接。绑定后， accept 方法用于启动对通道套接字的连接的接受。尝试在未绑定的通道上调用 accept 方法将导致引发 NotYetBoundException 。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to read up to count bytes from the source channel and write them to this channel's file starting at the given position. An invocation of this method may or may not transfer all of the requested bytes; whether or not it does so depends upon the natures and states of the channels. Fewer than the requested number of bytes will be transferred if the source channel has fewer than count bytes remaining, or if the source channel is non-blocking and has fewer than count bytes immediately available in its input buffer.
trans-unit.target: 尝试从源通道读取 count 字节并将其从给定 position 开始写入该通道的文件。调用此方法可能会或可能不会传输所有请求的字节；是否这样做取决于渠道的性质和状态。如果源通道的剩余剩余字节数少于 count 字节，或者源通道是非阻塞的且输入缓冲区中立即可用的 count 字节数少于字节，则将传输少于请求的字节数。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to read up to count bytes starting at the given position in this channel's file and write them to the target channel. An invocation of this method may or may not transfer all of the requested bytes; whether or not it does so depends upon the natures and states of the channels. Fewer than the requested number of bytes are transferred if this channel's file contains fewer than count bytes starting at the given position, or if the target channel is non-blocking and it has fewer than count bytes free in its output buffer.
trans-unit.target: 尝试读取该通道文件中给定 position 处开始 count 字节，并将其写入目标通道。调用此方法可能会或可能不会传输所有请求的字节；是否这样做取决于渠道的性质和状态。如果此通道的文件包含少于给定 position count 字节，或者目标通道为非阻塞且输出缓冲区中的可用字节少于 count ，则传输的字节数少于请求的字节数。

trans-unit.source: An attribute A1 in matchingAttributes is considered to match an attribute A2 of an object if A1 and A2 have the same identifier, and each value of A1 is equal to some value of A2. This implies that the order of values is not significant, and that A2 may contain "extra" values not found in A1 without affecting the comparison. It also implies that if A1 has no values, then testing for a match is equivalent to testing for the presence of an attribute A2 with the same identifier.
trans-unit.target: 一个属性阿1中 matchingAttributes 中被认为是匹配的属性阿2的对象，如果阿1和阿2具有相同的标识符，并且每个值阿1等于某个值阿2。这意味着值的顺序并不重要，并且A 2可能包含在A 1中找不到的“多余”值，而不会影响比较。这也意味着如果A 1没有值，则测试匹配项等同于测试属性A的存在。2具有相同的标识符。

The application must encode the stream using UTF-16 (defined in [Unicode] and in [ISO/IEC 10646]). It is not a requirement to have an XML declaration when using character streams. trans-unit.source: An attribute specifying whether error checking is enforced or not. When set to false, the implementation is free to not test every possible error case normally defined on DOM operations, and not raise any DOMException on DOM operations or report errors while using Document.normalizeDocument(). In case of error, the behavior is undefined. This attribute is true by default.
trans-unit.target: 一个属性，指定是否强制执行错误检查。设置为 false 时，实现可以自由地不测试通常在DOM操作上定义的每种可能的错误情况，并且在使用 Document.normalizeDocument() 时不引发DOM操作上的任何 DOMException 或报告错误。如果发生错误，则行为是不确定的。默认情况下，此属性为 true 。

Changing this attribute will affect methods that check for invalid characters in XML names. trans-unit.source: An attribute value is a small, atomic data item, such as an integer or an enumerated value. The Java Print Service API does not use primitive data types, such as int, to represent attribute values for these reasons:
trans-unit.target: 属性值是一个小的原子数据项,如整数或枚举值。由于这些原因,Java打印服务API不使用原始数据类型(如int)来表示属性值。

trans-unit.source: An attribute view provides a read-only or updatable view of the non-opaque values, or metadata, associated with objects in a file system. The FileAttributeView interface is extended by several other interfaces that provide views to specific sets of file attributes. FileAttributeViews are selected by invoking the Files.getFileAttributeView(java.nio.file.Path, java.lang.Class<V>, java.nio.file.LinkOption...) method with a type-token to identify the required view. Views can also be identified by name. The FileStoreAttributeView interface provides access to file store attributes. A FileStoreAttributeView of a given type is obtained by invoking the FileStore.getFileStoreAttributeView(java.lang.Class<V>) method.
trans-unit.target: 属性视图提供与文件系统中的对象相关联的非透明值或元数据的只读或可更新视图。所述 FileAttributeView 接口由提供视图特定集合的文件属性的几个其它接口延长。通过调用带有类型令牌的 Files.getFileAttributeView(java.nio.file.Path, java.lang.Class<V>, java.nio.file.LinkOption...) 方法来选择所需的视图，从而选择 FileAttributeViews 。视图也可以通过名称来标识。该 FileStoreAttributeView 接口提供了文件存储的属性访问。甲 FileStoreAttributeView 给定类型的通过调用获得 FileStore.getFileStoreAttributeView(java.lang.Class<V>) 方法。

trans-unit.source: An attribute view provides a read-only or updatable view of the non-opaque values, or metadata, associated with objects in a file system. The FileAttributeView interface is extended by several other interfaces that that views to specific sets of file attributes. FileAttributeViews are selected by invoking the Files.getFileAttributeView(java.nio.file.Path, java.lang.Class<V>, java.nio.file.LinkOption...) method with a type-token to identify the required view. Views can also be identified by name. The FileStoreAttributeView interface provides access to file store attributes. A FileStoreAttributeView of a given type is obtained by invoking the FileStore.getFileStoreAttributeView(java.lang.Class<V>) method.
trans-unit.target: 属性视图提供了与文件系统中的对象相关联的非透明值或元数据的只读或可更新视图。该 FileAttributeView 接口是由其他几个接口扩展是该意见的具体设置文件属性。通过调用带有类型令牌的 Files.getFileAttributeView(java.nio.file.Path, java.lang.Class<V>, java.nio.file.LinkOption...) 方法来选择所需的视图，从而选择 FileAttributeViews 。视图也可以通过名称标识。该 FileStoreAttributeView 接口提供了文件存储的属性访问。甲 FileStoreAttributeView 给定类型的通过调用获得 FileStore.getFileStoreAttributeView(java.lang.Class<V>) 方法。

trans-unit.source: An attribute view that is a read-only or updatable view of non-opaque values associated with a file in a filesystem.
trans-unit.target: 一个属性视图,是与文件系统中的文件相关联的非不透明值的只读或可更新视图。

trans-unit.source: An attribute view that is a read-only or updatable view of non-opaque values associated with a file in a filesystem. This interface is extended or implemented by specific file attribute views that define methods to read and/or update the attributes of a file.
trans-unit.target: 一种属性视图,是与文件系统中的文件相关的非不透明值的只读或可更新的视图。该接口由特定的文件属性视图扩展或实现,这些视图定义了读取和/或更新文件属性的方法。

trans-unit.source: An attribute view that is a read-only or updatable view of the attributes of a FileStore.
trans-unit.target: 属性视图，它是 FileStore 属性的只读或可更新视图。

trans-unit.source: An audio input stream is an input stream with a specified audio format and length.
trans-unit.target: 音频输入流是指具有指定音频格式和长度的输入流。

trans-unit.source: An audio input stream is an input stream with a specified audio format and length. The length is expressed in sample frames, not bytes. Several methods are provided for reading a certain number of bytes from the stream, or an unspecified number of bytes. The audio input stream keeps track of the last byte that was read. You can skip over an arbitrary number of bytes to get to a later position for reading. An audio input stream may support marks. When you set a mark, the current position is remembered so that you can return to it later.
trans-unit.target: 音频输入流是具有指定音频格式和长度的输入流。长度以采样帧表示,而不是以字节表示。有几种方法可以从流中读取一定数量的字节,或未指定数量的字节。音频输入流会跟踪读取的最后一个字节。你可以跳过任意数量的字节,以到达后面的位置进行读取。音频输入流可能支持标记。当您设置一个标记时,当前的位置会被记住,以便以后可以返回到它。

trans-unit.source: An automatic module.
trans-unit.target: 一个自动模块。

trans-unit.source: An automatic module. An automatic module is treated as if it exports and opens all packages.
trans-unit.target: 一个自动模块。自动模块的处理方式就像它出口和打开所有包件一样。

trans-unit.source: An autoscrolling gesture is initiated by the user by keeping the drag cursor motionless with a border region of the Component, referred to as the "autoscrolling region", for a predefined period of time, this will result in repeated scroll requests to the Component until the drag Cursor resumes its motion.
trans-unit.target: 自动滚动手势由用户启动，方法是使拖动光标在 Component 的边框区域（称为“自动滚动区域”）保持不动，并持续预定的时间，这将导致对 Component 重复滚动请求，直到拖动 Cursor 恢复其运动。

trans-unit.source: An easy way to generate a standard table of value labels is by using the createStandardLabels method.
trans-unit.target: 生成值标签标准表的一种简单方法是使用 createStandardLabels 方法。

trans-unit.source: An echo character is useful for text fields where user input should not be echoed to the screen, as in the case of a text field for entering a password.
trans-unit.target: 回音符对于用户输入不应回传到屏幕上的文本字段很有用,比如输入密码的文本字段。

trans-unit.source: An echo character is useful for text fields where user input should not be echoed to the screen, as in the case of a text field for entering a password. If echoChar = 0, user input is echoed to the screen unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 回声字符对于不应将用户输入回显到屏幕的文本字段很有用，例如在输入密码的文本字段的情况下。如果 echoChar = 0 ，则将用户输入原样回显到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: An echo character is useful for text fields where user input should not be echoed to the screen, as in the case of a text field for entering a password. Setting echoChar = 0 allows user input to be echoed to the screen again.
trans-unit.target: 回声字符对于不应将用户输入回显到屏幕的文本字段很有用，例如在输入密码的文本字段的情况下。设置 echoChar = 0 允许用户输入再次回显到屏幕上。

trans-unit.source: An editor for a JSpinner whose model is a SpinnerDateModel.
trans-unit.target: JSpinner 的编辑器，其模型为 SpinnerDateModel 。

trans-unit.source: An editor for a JSpinner whose model is a SpinnerDateModel. The value of the editor is displayed with a JFormattedTextField whose format is defined by a DateFormatter instance whose minimum and maximum properties are mapped to the SpinnerDateModel.
trans-unit.target: JSpinner 的编辑器，其模型为 SpinnerDateModel 。编辑器的值与 JFormattedTextField 一起显示，其格式由 DateFormatter 实例定义，该实例的 minimum 和 maximum 属性映射到 SpinnerDateModel 。

trans-unit.source: An editor for a JSpinner whose model is a SpinnerListModel.
trans-unit.target: JSpinner 的编辑器，其模型为 SpinnerListModel 。

trans-unit.source: An editor for a JSpinner whose model is a SpinnerNumberModel.
trans-unit.target: JSpinner 的编辑器，其模型为 SpinnerNumberModel 。
