trans-unit.target: JSpinner 的编辑器，其模型为 SpinnerNumberModel 。编辑器的值与 JFormattedTextField 一起显示，其格式由 NumberFormatter 实例定义，该实例的 minimum 和 maximum 属性映射到 SpinnerNumberModel 。

trans-unit.source: An editor object for the given target class. The result is null if no suitable editor can be found.
trans-unit.target: 指定目标类的编辑器对象。如果找不到合适的编辑器,结果为空。

trans-unit.source: An element as described in a DTD using the ELEMENT construct.
trans-unit.target: DTD中使用ELEMENT结构描述的元素。

trans-unit.source: An element as described in a DTD using the ELEMENT construct. This is essential the description of a tag. It describes the type, content model, attributes, attribute types etc. It is used to correctly parse a document by the Parser.
trans-unit.target: DTD中使用ELEMENT结构描述的元素。这是对标签的基本描述。它描述类型、内容模型、属性、属性类型等。它被用来让解析器正确解析文档。

trans-unit.source: An element in a stack trace, as returned by Throwable.getStackTrace().
trans-unit.target: 堆栈跟踪中的元素，由 Throwable.getStackTrace() 返回。

trans-unit.source: An element in a stack trace, as returned by Throwable.getStackTrace(). Each element represents a single stack frame. All stack frames except for the one at the top of the stack represent a method invocation. The frame at the top of the stack represents the execution point at which the stack trace was generated. Typically, this is the point at which the throwable corresponding to the stack trace was created.
trans-unit.target: 堆栈跟踪中的元素，由 Throwable.getStackTrace() 返回。每个元素代表一个单独的堆栈框架。除堆栈顶部的所有框架外，所有其他框架均表示方法调用。堆栈顶部的框架表示生成堆栈跟踪的执行点。通常，这是创建与堆栈跟踪相对应的throwable的点。

trans-unit.source: An element in a stack trace, as returned by Throwable.getStackTrace().
trans-unit.target: 堆栈跟踪中的元素，由 Throwable.getStackTrace() 返回。

trans-unit.source: An element in a stack trace, as returned by Throwable.getStackTrace(). Each element represents a single stack frame. All stack frames except for the one at the top of the stack represent a method invocation. The frame at the top of the stack represents the execution point at which the stack trace was generated. Typically, this is the point at which the throwable corresponding to the stack trace was created.
trans-unit.target: 堆栈跟踪中的元素，由 Throwable.getStackTrace() 返回。每个元素代表一个堆栈框架。除堆栈顶部的所有框架外，所有其他框架均表示方法调用。堆栈顶部的框架表示生成堆栈跟踪的执行点。通常，这是创建与堆栈跟踪相对应的throwable的点。

trans-unit.source: An element is considered to be included, if it is specified if it contains a specified element, or it is enclosed in a specified element, and is selected. Included elements will be documented.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了某个元素（如果它包含一个指定的元素，或者被包含在一个指定的元素中并且被选中），则认为该元素被包括在内。包含的元素将被记录在案。

trans-unit.source: An element is considered to be selected, if the selection controlsallow it to be documented. (Note that synthetic elements are never selected.)
trans-unit.target: 如果选择控件允许将其记录在文档中，则认为该元素已被选择。（请注意，永远不会选择合成元素。）

trans-unit.source: An element that represents a chunk of text that has a set of HTML character level attributes assigned to it.
trans-unit.target: 一个代表文本块的元素,该文本块有一组HTML字符级别的属性分配给它。

trans-unit.source: An element that represents a structural block of HTML.
trans-unit.target: 表示HTML的结构块的元素。

trans-unit.source: An elliptic curve point used to specify keys as defined by RFC 8032: Edwards-Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (EdDSA).
trans-unit.target: 一个椭圆形的曲线点，用于指定RFC 8032：Edwards-Curve数字签名算法（EdDSA）定义的键。

trans-unit.source: An elliptic curve point used to specify keys as defined by RFC 8032: Edwards-Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (EdDSA). These points are distinct from the points represented by ECPoint, and they are intended for use with algorithms based on RFC 8032 such as the EdDSA Signature algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 一个椭圆形的曲线点，用于指定RFC 8032：Edwards-Curve数字签名算法（EdDSA）定义的键。这些点与 ECPoint 表示的点不同，它们旨在与基于RFC 8032的算法（例如EdDSA Signature 算法）一起使用。

trans-unit.source: An embedded HTML comment.
trans-unit.target: 嵌入的HTML评论。

trans-unit.source: An embedded Java applet.
trans-unit.target: 一个嵌入式Java小程序。

trans-unit.source: An embedded Java applet. See the APPLET element definition in HTML 4.0. This element is deprecated in HTML 4.0.
trans-unit.target: 一个嵌入式的Java小程序。参见HTML 4.0中APPLET元素的定义。这个元素在HTML 4.0中已被废弃。

trans-unit.source: An empty Border.
trans-unit.target: 空的 Border 。

trans-unit.source: An empty Border. This field might not be used. To change the Border used by this renderer directly set it using the setBorder method.
trans-unit.target: 空的 Border 。可能不使用该字段。要更改此渲染器使用的 Border ，请使用 setBorder 方法直接对其进行设置。

trans-unit.source: An empty Name has a length of zero.
trans-unit.target: 空 Name 的长度为零。

trans-unit.source: An empty Source is represented as an empty document as constructed by DocumentBuilder.newDocument(). The result of transforming an empty Source depends on the transformation behavior; it is not always an empty Result.
trans-unit.target: 空的 Source 表示为由 DocumentBuilder.newDocument() 构造的空文档。转换空 Source 的结果取决于转换行为。它并不总是空的 Result 。

trans-unit.source: An empty array is returned if the row count is 0, or the specified indices do not bound the viewable set of rows.
trans-unit.target: 如果行数为 0 ，或者指定的索引未绑定可见行集，则返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: An empty attribute set.
trans-unit.target: 一个空的属性集。

trans-unit.source: An empty authority component is permitted as long as it is followed by a non-empty path, a query component, or a fragment component. This allows the parsing of URIs such as "file:///foo/bar", which seems to be the intent of RFC 2396 although the grammar does not permit it. If the authority component is empty then the user-information, host, and port components are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 允许为空的授权组件，只要它后面跟随非空路径，查询组件或片段组件即可。这允许解析诸如 "file:///foo/bar" 之类的URI，尽管语法不允许，但这似乎是RFC 2396的意图。如果授权组件为空，则用户信息，主机和端口组件未定义。

trans-unit.source: An empty border UI resource.
trans-unit.target: 一个空的边框UI资源。

trans-unit.source: An empty copy of this CachedRowSet object
trans-unit.target: 此 CachedRowSet 对象的空副本

trans-unit.source: An empty descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 一个空描述符。

trans-unit.source: An empty enum set of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 指定类型的空枚举集。

trans-unit.source: An empty implementation of the MouseInputListener interface, provided as a convenience to simplify the task of creating listeners, by extending and implementing only the methods of interest.
trans-unit.target: MouseInputListener 接口的空实现，通过仅扩展和实现感兴趣的方法来简化创建侦听器的任务，以提供便利。

trans-unit.source: An empty implementation of the MouseInputListener interface, provided as a convenience to simplify the task of creating listeners, by extending and implementing only the methods of interest. This class also provides an empty implementation of the MouseWheelListener interface, through its extension from AWT's MouseAdapter.
trans-unit.target: MouseInputListener 接口的空实现，通过仅扩展和实现感兴趣的方法来简化创建侦听器的任务，以提供便利。此类也通过AWT的 MouseAdapter 的扩展提供了 MouseWheelListener 接口的空实现。

trans-unit.source: An empty input.
trans-unit.target: 一个空输入。

trans-unit.source: An empty input. The input is considered incomplete. Comments and white-space are still considered empty.
trans-unit.target: 一个空的输入。该输入被认为是不完整的。注释和空白处仍然被认为是空的。

trans-unit.source: An empty spliterator
trans-unit.target: 一个空的分离器

trans-unit.source: An encapsulation of option name, aliases, parameters and descriptions as used by the Doclet.
trans-unit.target: Doclet使用的选项名称、别名、参数和描述的封装。

trans-unit.source: An encapsulation of the result state produced by SSLEngine I/O calls.
trans-unit.target: SSLEngine I / O调用产生的结果状态的封装。

trans-unit.source: An endpoint is a String representation of an LDAP URL which points to an LDAP server to be used for LDAP operations. The syntax of an LDAP URL is defined by RFC 2255: The LDAP URL Format.
trans-unit.target: 端点是LDAP URL的 String 表示形式，它指向要用于LDAP操作的LDAP服务器。LDAP URL的语法由RFC 2255定义：LDAP URL Format。

trans-unit.source: An engine that can transform a sequence of bytes in a specific charset into a sequence of sixteen-bit Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: 能够将特定字符集中的字节序列转换为16位Unicode字符序列的引擎。

trans-unit.source: An engine that can transform a sequence of sixteen-bit Unicode characters into a sequence of bytes in a specific charset.
trans-unit.target: 一个能够将16位Unicode字符序列转换为特定字符集的字节序列的引擎。

trans-unit.source: An engine that performs match operations on a character sequence by interpreting a Pattern.
trans-unit.target: 通过解释 Pattern 对字符序列执行匹配操作的引擎。

trans-unit.source: An engine's client authentication setting is one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 一个引擎的客户端认证设置是以下之一。

trans-unit.source: An entity declared within a user defined type (class or interface).
trans-unit.target: 在用户定义的类型(类或接口)中声明的实体。

trans-unit.source: An entity declared within a user defined type (class or interface). This interface is the root of the type component hierarchy which includes Field and Method. Type components of the same name declared in different classes (including those related by inheritance) have different TypeComponent objects. TypeComponents can be used alone to retrieve static information about their declaration, or can be used in conjunction with a ReferenceType or ObjectReference to access values or invoke, as applicable.
trans-unit.target: 在用户定义的类型（类或接口）中声明的实体。此接口是类型组件层次结构的根，其中包括 Field 和 Method 。在不同类中声明的同名类型组件（包括通过继承关联的那些组件）具有不同的TypeComponent对象。TypeComponents可以单独用于检索有关其声明的静态信息，也可以与 ReferenceType 或 ObjectReference 结合使用以访问值或调用（如果适用）。

trans-unit.source: An event that characterizes a change in selection. The change is limited to a a single inclusive interval. The selection of at least one index within the range will have changed. A decent ListSelectionModel implementation will keep the range as small as possible. ListSelectionListeners will generally query the source of the event for the new selected status of each potentially changed row.
trans-unit.target: 表征选择更改的事件。更改仅限于单个包含时间间隔。该范围内至少一个索引的选择将发生变化。不错的 ListSelectionModel 实现将范围保持尽可能小。 ListSelectionListeners 通常将在事件源中查询每个可能更改的行的新选定状态。

trans-unit.target: 一个事件，当由AWT事件分派器线程分派时，在 Runnable 上执行 run() 方法。此类可以用作 ActiveEvent 的引用实现，而不是声明一个新类并定义 dispatch() 。

trans-unit.source: An event which indicates that a mouse action occurred in a component.
trans-unit.target: 表示在组件中发生鼠标操作的事件。

trans-unit.source: An event which indicates that a mouse action occurred in a component. A mouse action is considered to occur in a particular component if and only if the mouse cursor is over the unobscured part of the component's bounds when the action happens. For lightweight components, such as Swing's components, mouse events are only dispatched to the component if the mouse event type has been enabled on the component. A mouse event type is enabled by adding the appropriate mouse-based EventListener to the component (MouseListener or MouseMotionListener), or by invoking Component.enableEvents(long) with the appropriate mask parameter (AWTEvent.MOUSE_EVENT_MASK or AWTEvent.MOUSE_MOTION_EVENT_MASK). If the mouse event type has not been enabled on the component, the corresponding mouse events are dispatched to the first ancestor that has enabled the mouse event type.
trans-unit.target: 指示在组件中发生鼠标动作的事件。当且仅当在发生动作时鼠标光标悬停在组件边界的未遮盖部分上时，才认为该鼠标动作发生在特定组件中。对于轻型组件，例如Swing的组件，只有在组件上启用了鼠标事件类型时，才会将鼠标事件调度到组件。通过将适当的基于鼠标的 EventListener 添加到组件（ MouseListener 或 MouseMotionListener ），或通过使用适当的掩码参数（ AWTEvent.MOUSE_EVENT_MASK 或 AWTEvent.MOUSE_MOTION_EVENT_MASK Component.enableEvents(long) 调用Component.enableEvents（long），可以启用鼠标事件类型。）。如果尚未在组件上启用鼠标事件类型，则将相应的鼠标事件分派到已启用鼠标事件类型的第一个祖先。

trans-unit.source: An event which indicates that the mouse wheel was rotated in a component.
trans-unit.target: 表示鼠标滚轮在组件中被旋转的事件。

trans-unit.source: An example is grammatical information attached to a sentence: For the previous sentence, you can say that "an example" is the subject, but you cannot say the same about "an", "example", or "exam". When the text is changed, the grammatical information typically becomes invalid. Another example is Japanese reading information (yomi).

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown while collecting information about the events. That is, when the listener receives a NamingExceptionEvent.
trans-unit.target: 收集有关事件的信息时会引发异常。也就是说，当侦听器收到 NamingExceptionEvent 时。

trans-unit.source: An exception may have suppressed exceptions while also being caused by another exception. Whether or not an exception has a cause is semantically known at the time of its creation, unlike whether or not an exception will suppress other exceptions which is typically only determined after an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 一个异常可能有压制异常,同时也是由另一个异常引起的。一个异常是否有原因,在其产生时语义上是已知的,而不像一个异常是否会抑制其他异常,通常只有在异常被抛出后才能确定。

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred during the introspection of an MBean.
trans-unit.target: 在反省MBean的过程中,发生了一个例外。

trans-unit.source: An exception of type NumberFormatException is thrown if any of the following situations occurs:
trans-unit.target: 如果发生以下任一情况，将引发 NumberFormatException 类型的异常：

trans-unit.source: An exception that indicates an X.509 certificate is revoked.
trans-unit.target: 表示X.509证书被撤销的异常。

trans-unit.source: An exception that indicates an X.509 certificate is revoked. A CertificateRevokedException contains additional information about the revoked certificate, such as the date on which the certificate was revoked and the reason it was revoked.
trans-unit.target: 指示X.509证书的异常已吊销。一个 CertificateRevokedException 包含有关撤销证书的附加信息，如该证书被吊销之日起，它被撤销的原因。

trans-unit.source: An exception that indicates the requested look & feel management classes are not present on the user's system.
trans-unit.target: 指示请求的外观管理类的异常不在用户系统上。

trans-unit.source: An exception that provides information on a database access error or other errors.
trans-unit.target: 提供数据库访问错误或其他错误信息的异常。

trans-unit.source: An exception that provides information on database access warnings.
trans-unit.target: 提供数据库访问警告信息的异常。

trans-unit.source: An exception that provides information on database access warnings. Warnings are silently chained to the object whose method caused it to be reported.
trans-unit.target: 提供数据库访问警告信息的异常。警告会被静静地链在其方法导致其被报告的对象上。

trans-unit.source: An exception thrown as a DataTruncation exception (on writes) or reported as a DataTruncation warning (on reads) when a data values is unexpectedly truncated for reasons other than its having exceeded MaxFieldSize.
trans-unit.target: 当数据值由于其超出 MaxFieldSize 以外的其他原因而意外被截断时，作为 DataTruncation 异常（写入）抛出或报告为 DataTruncation 警告（读取）的异常。

trans-unit.source: An exception thrown when an error occurs during parsing.
trans-unit.target: 当解析过程中出现错误时抛出的异常。

trans-unit.source: An exception will be thrown if the application attempts to write more data than the indicated content-length, or if the application closes the OutputStream before writing the indicated amount.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序试图写入比指定的内容长度更多的数据,或者如果应用程序在写入指定的数量之前关闭了OutputStream,则会抛出一个异常。

trans-unit.source: An execution of the task throws an exception. In this case calling get on the returned future will throw ExecutionException, holding the exception as its cause.
trans-unit.target: 任务的执行将引发异常。在这种情况下，在返回的Future上调用 get 将会抛出 ExecutionException ，将异常作为其原因。
